value: Idols as Mediators:\nA Common Myth

*38:69 The feud in the High Society was triggered by Satan’s challenge to God’s absolute authority. This is definitely the most important event in the history of the human race. We failed to make a firm stand regarding God’s absolute authority. This life represents the third and final chance to redeem ourselves (See the Introduction and Appendix 7).
YENİSİ: *38:69 Yüce Toplum’daki kavga, Şeytan’ın Tanrı’nın mutlak otoritesine meydan okumasıyla tetiklendi. Bu, kesinlikle insan ırkının tarihindeki en önemli olaydır. Bizler Tanrı’nın mutlak otoritesi ile alakalı sağlam bir duruş sergileyemedik. Bu hayat, kendimizi kurtarmamız için üçüncü ve son şansımızdır (Giriş’e ve Ek 7’ye bakınız).

value: The Throngs (Al-Zumar) 39:5-16
YENİSİ: Yığınlar (El-Zümer) 39:5-16

value: He created the heavens and the earth truthfully. He rolls the night over the day, and rolls the day over the night.* He committed the sun and the moon, each running for a finite period. Absolutely, He is the Almighty, the Forgiving.

He created you from one person, then created from him his mate. He sent down to you eight kinds of livestock. He creates you in your mothers’ bellies, creation after creation, in trimesters of darkness. Such is GOD your Lord. To Him belongs all sovereignty. There is no other god beside Him. How could you deviate?
YENİSİ: O sizi bir kişiden yarattı, sonra ondan da eşini yarattı. Size sekiz tür çiftlik hayvanı indirdi. Sizi annelerinizin karınlarında, yaratılıştan yaratılışa, üç karanlık dönemde yaratmaktadır. İşte böyledir Rabbiniz TANRI. Bütün hükümranlık O’na aittir. O’nun yanında başka bir tanrı yoktur. Nasıl olur da saparsınız?

value: If you disbelieve, GOD does not need anyone. But He dislikes to see His servants make the wrong decision. If you decide to be appreciative, He is pleased for you. No soul bears the sins of any other soul. Ultimately, to your Lord is your return, then He will inform you of everything you had done. He is fully aware of the innermost thoughts.
YENİSİ: Eğer inkâr ederseniz TANRI’nın hiç kimseye ihtiyacı yoktur. Fakat O, kullarının yanlış karar vermesini görmekten hoşlanmaz. Eğer minnettar olmaya karar verirseniz, O sizden hoşnut olur. Hiçbir nefis bir başka nefsin günahlarını yüklenmez. En nihayetinde geri dönüşünüz Rabbinizedir, sonra yapmış olduğunuz her şeyi size haber verecektir. O, en içteki düşüncelerin tamamen farkındadır.

value: When the human being is afflicted, he implores his Lord, sincerely devoted to Him. But as soon as He blesses him, he forgets his previous imploring, sets up idols to rank with GOD and to divert others from His path. Say, “Enjoy your disbelief temporarily; you have incurred the hellfire.”

Is it not better to be one of those who meditate in the night, prostrating and staying up, being aware of the Hereafter, and seeking the mercy of their Lord? Say, “Are those who know equal to those who do not know?” Only those who possess intelligence will take heed.

Say, “O My servants who believed, you shall reverence your Lord.” For those who worked righteousness in this world, a good reward. GOD’s earth is spacious, and those who steadfastly persevere will receive their recompense generously, without limits.
Say, “I have been commanded to worship GOD, devoting the religion absolutely to Him alone.
“And I was commanded to be the utmost submitter.”
Say, “I fear, if I disobeyed my Lord, the retribution of a great day.”
Say, “GOD is the only One I worship, devoting my religion absolutely to Him alone.
“Therefore, worship whatever you wish besides Him.” Say, “The real losers are those who lose their souls, and their families, on the Day of Resurrection.” Most certainly, this is the real loss.
YENİSİ: “O halde, O’nun dışında dilediğinize tapın.” De ki, “Asıl kaybedenler, Diriliş Günü’nde kendi nefislerini ve ailelerini kaybedenlerdir.” Hiç şüphe yok ki, asıl kayıp budur.

value: They will have masses of fire on top of them, and under them. GOD thus alerts His servants: O My servants, you shall reverence Me.
The Shape of the Earth*
Believe For Your Own Good
God ALONE

*39:5 This verse clearly informs us that the earth is round. The Arabic for “He rolls” (Yukawwir) is derived from the Arabic word for “ball” (Kurah). Since the Earth is not exactly round, a specific reference to its shape is given in 79:30. The Quran is replete with scientific information that became known to us centuries after the revelation of the Quran. See Appendix 20.
The Throngs (Al-Zumar) 39:17-32
YENİSİ: Yığınlar (El-Zümer) 39:17-32

value: As for those who discard the worship of all idols, and devote themselves totally to GOD alone, they have deserved happiness. Give good news to My servants.
They are the ones who examine all words, then follow the best. These are the ones whom GOD has guided; these are the ones who possess intelligence.
YENİSİ: Onlar tüm sözleri inceleyen, ardından en güzeline uyanlardır. Bunlar TANRI’nın rehberlik ettiği kimselerdir; bunlar akıl sahibi kimselerdir.

value: With regard to those who have deserved the retribution, can you save those who are already in Hell?
As for those who reverence their Lord, they will have mansions upon mansions constructed for them, with flowing streams. This is GOD’s promise, and GOD never breaks His promise.

Do you not see that GOD sends down from the sky water, then places it into underground wells, then produces with it plants of various colors, then they grow until they turn yellow, then He turns them into hay? This should be a reminder for those who possess intelligence.
If GOD renders one’s heart content with Submission, he will be following a light from his Lord. Therefore, woe to those whose hearts are hardened against GOD’s message; they have gone far astray.
YENİSİ: Eğer TANRI birinin kalbini Teslimiyet'e hoşnut kılarsa, o, Rabbinden bir ışığı takip ediyor olacaktır. Bu nedenle, TANRI’nın mesajına karşı kalpleri katılaşanlara yazıklar olsun; onlar uzak bir sapıklıktadırlar.

value: GOD has revealed herein the best Hadith; a book that is consistent, and points out both ways (to Heaven and Hell). The skins of those who reverence their Lord cringe therefrom, then their skins and their hearts soften up for GOD’s message. Such is GOD’s guidance; He bestows it upon whomever He wills. As for those sent astray by GOD, nothing can guide them.
YENİSİ: TANRI burada en güzel Hadis'i vahyetti; bir kitap ki tutarlı ve her iki yolu da (Cenneti de Cehennemi de) gösteriyor. Rablerine derin saygı duyanların derileri ondan ürperir, ardından onların derileri ve kalpleri TANRI’nın mesajına karşı yumuşar. Böyledir TANRI’nın rehberliği; onu kime irade ederse ona ihsan eder. TANRI tarafından saptırılanlara gelince, onlara hiçbir şey rehberlik edemez.

value: What is better than saving one’s face from the terrible retribution on the Day of Resurrection? The transgressors will be told, “Taste the consequences of what you earned.”
Others before them have disbelieved and, consequently, the retribution afflicted them whence they never expected.
GOD has condemned them to humiliation in this life, and the retribution in the Hereafter will be far worse, if they only knew.
We have cited for the people every kind of example in this Quran, that they may take heed.
An Arabic Quran, without any ambiguity, that they may be righteous.

GOD cites the example of a man who deals with disputing partners (Hadith), compared to a man who deals with only one consistent source (Quran). Are they the same? Praise be to GOD; most of them do not know.
YENİSİ: TANRI, çekişen ortaklar (Hadis) ile muhatap olan bir adamın örneğini, yalnızca tek bir tutarlı kaynak (Kuran) ile muhatap olan bir adama kıyasla verir. Onlar aynı mıdır? TANRI’ya övgüler olsun; onların çoğu bilmez.

value: You (Muhammad) will surely die, just like they will die.
On the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord, you people will feud with one another.
Who is more evil than one who attributes lies to GOD, while disbelieving in the truth that has come to him? Is Hell not a just requital for the disbelievers?
YENİSİ: Kendisine gelmiş hakikati inkâr ederek TANRI’ya yalanlar atfedenden daha kötü kimdir? Cehennem, inkârcılar için adil bir karşılık değil midir?

value: Follow the Word of God
YENİSİ: Tanrı’nın Sözüne Uyun

value: The Righteous
YENİSİ: Doğrular

YENİSİ: En Güzel Hadis

value: Quran: No Ambiguity
Hadith: A Gross Blasphemy

YENİSİ: Yığınlar (El-Zümer) 39:33-46

value: As for those who promote the truth, and believe therein, they are the righteous.
They will get everything they wish, at their Lord. Such is the reward for the righteous.
GOD remits their sinful works, and rewards them generously for their good works.
YENİSİ: TANRI onların günahkâr işlerini örter ve güzel işleri için onları cömertçe ödüllendirir.

value: Is GOD not sufficient for His servant? They frighten you with the idols they set up beside Him. Whomever GOD sends astray, nothing can guide him.
YENİSİ: TANRI, Kendi kuluna yetmez mi? Onlar seni, O’nun yanında edindikleri putlarla korkuturlar. TANRI kimi saptırırsa, hiçbir şey ona rehberlik edemez.

value: And whomever GOD guides, nothing can send him astray. Is GOD not Almighty, Avenger?
YENİSİ: Ve TANRI kime rehberlik ederse, hiçbir şey de onu saptıramaz. TANRI Kudretli ve İntikam Alıcı değil midir?

value: If you ask them, “Who created the heavens and the earth?” they will say, “GOD.” Say, “Why then do you set up idols beside GOD? If GOD willed any adversity for me, can they relieve such an adversity? And if He willed a blessing for me, can they prevent such a blessing?” Say, “GOD is sufficient for me.” In Him the trusters shall trust.
YENİSİ: Eğer onlara “Gökleri ve yeryüzünü kim yarattı?” diye sorsan “TANRI” diyeceklerdir. De ki: “O halde neden TANRI’nın yanında putlar ediniyorsunuz? Eğer TANRI benim için bir sıkıntı irade etmiş olsa, onlar böyle bir sıkıntıyı dindirebilirler mi? Ve eğer O benim için bir nimet irade etmiş olsa, onlar böyle bir nimeti engelleyebilirler mi?” De ki: “Bana TANRI yeter.” Güvenenler, O’na güvensinler.

value: Say, “O my people, do your best and I will do my best; you will surely find out.
“(You will find out) who has incurred shameful punishment, and has deserved an eternal retribution.”

We have revealed the scripture through you for the people, truthfully. Then, whoever is guided is guided for his own good, and whoever goes astray goes astray to his own detriment. You are not their advocate.
YENİSİ: Biz kutsal yazıyı, senin aracılığınla insanlar için hakikate uygun olarak vahyettik. Sonra, kim rehberlik edilirse kendi iyiliği için rehberlik edilir ve kim saparsa kendi zararına sapar. Onların savunucusu sen değilsin.

value: GOD puts the souls to death when the end of their life comes, and also at the time of sleep. Thus, He takes some back during their sleep, while others are allowed to continue living until the end of their predetermined interim. This should provide lessons for people who reflect.
YENİSİ: TANRI, hayatlarının sonu geldiğinde ve bir de uyku anında nefisleri ölüme koyar. Böylece O, bazılarını uykuları sırasında geri alır, diğerlerinin ise yaşamaya devam etmelerine izin verilir, ta ki önceden belirlenmiş geçici sürelerinin sonuna kadar. Bu, derinlemesine düşünen halk için dersler sağlamalıdır.

value: Have they invented intercessors to mediate between them and GOD? Say, “What if they do not possess any power, nor understanding?”
YENİSİ: Onlar ile TANRI arasında aracılık etsinler diye şefaatçiler mi uydurdular? De ki: “Ya onlar ne herhangi bir güce ne de anlayışa sahip değillerse?”

value: Say, “All intercession belongs to GOD.” To Him belongs all sovereignty of the heavens and the earth, then to Him you will be returned.
YENİSİ: De ki: “Bütün şefaat TANRI’ya aittir.” Göklerin ve yeryüzünün tüm hükümranlığı O’na aittir, sonra siz O’na geri döndürüleceksiniz.

value: When GOD ALONE is mentioned, the hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter shrink with aversion. But when others are mentioned beside Him, they become satisfied.*
YENİSİ: TANRI TEK BAŞINA anıldığı zaman Ahirete inanmayanların kalpleri tiksintiyle daralır. Fakat O’nun yanında başkaları da anıldığı zaman, onlar tatmin olurlar.*

value: Proclaim: “Our god, Initiator of the heavens and the earth, Knower of all secrets and declarations, You are the only One who judges among Your servants regarding their disputes.”
YENİSİ: İlan et: “Gökleri ve yeryüzünü Başlatan, bütün sırları ve beyanları Bilen tanrımız, ihtilaflarına dair Senin kulların arasında hüküm veren yalnız Sensin.”

value: Quran: Absolute Truth
YENİSİ: Kuran: Mutlak Hakikat

value: Profound Question
YENİSİ: Esaslı Soru

value: They Believe in God Yet,\nThey Are Going to Hell
The Myth of Intercession
YENİSİ: Şefaat Efsanesi

value: The Greatest Criterion*
YENİSİ: En Büyük Kriter*

value: *39:45 Despite the clear commandment in 3:18 that the First Pillar of Islam is proclaiming: “Ash-hadu An Lã Elãha Ellã Allãh (there is no other god beside God),” the majority of “Muslims” insist upon adding the name of Muhammad. This Greatest Criterion alerts us that rejoicing in adding the name of Muhammad, or any other name, exposes disbelief in the Hereafter. See also Footnote 17:46.
The Throngs (Al-Zumar) 39:47-65
YENİSİ: Yığınlar (El-Zümer) 39:47-65

value: If those who transgressed owned everything on earth, even twice as much, they would readily give it up to avoid the terrible retribution on the Day of Resurrection. They will be shown by GOD what they never expected.
The sinful works they had earned will be shown to them, and the very things they used to mock will come back to haunt them.

If the human is touched by adversity, he implores us, but as soon as we bestow a blessing upon him, he says, “I attained this because of my cleverness!” Indeed, this is only a test, but most of them do not know.
Those before them have uttered the same thing, and their earnings did not help them in the least.
They suffered the consequences of their evil works. Similarly, the transgressors among the present generation will suffer the consequences of their evil works; they cannot escape.
Do they not realize that GOD is the One who increases the provision for whomever He chooses, and withholds? These are lessons for people who believe.
YENİSİ: Onlar, rızkı seçtiği kimse için artıranın ve seçtiği kimse için kısıtlayanın TANRI olduğunu fark etmiyorlar mı? Bunlar inanan insanlar için derslerdir.

value: Proclaim: “O My servants who exceeded the limits, never despair of GOD’s mercy. For GOD forgives all sins. He is the Forgiver, Most Merciful.”
YENİSİ: İlan et: “Ey Benim sınırları aşmış olan kullarım, TANRI’nın merhametinden asla ümit kesmeyin. Zira TANRI bütün günahları bağışlar. O Bağışlayıcıdır, En Merhametli Olandır.”

value: You shall obey your Lord, and submit to Him totally, before the retribution overtakes you, then you cannot be helped.
YENİSİ: Azap sizi yakalamadan önce Rabbinize itaat edin ve O’na tümüyle teslim olun; sonra size yardım edilemez.

value: And follow the best path that is pointed out for you by your Lord, before the retribution overtakes you suddenly when you least expect it.
YENİSİ: Ve azap hiç beklemediğiniz bir anda sizi aniden yakalamadan önce Rabbiniz tarafından size açıkça gösterilen en güzel yolu takip edin.

value: Lest a soul may say, “How sorry I am for disregarding GOD’s commandments; I was certainly one of the mockers.”
YENİSİ: Bir nefis, “TANRI’nın buyruklarını göz ardı ettiğim için ne kadar pişmanım; kuşkusuz ben alaycılardan biriydim” demesin diye.

value: Or say, “Had GOD guided me, I would have been with the righteous.”
YENİSİ: Veya “TANRI bana rehberlik etmiş olsaydı doğrularla birlikte olurdum” demesin diye.

value: Or say, when it sees the retribution, “If I get another chance, I will work righteousness.”
YENİSİ: Veya azabı gördüğünde, “Eğer başka bir şansım olursa doğruluğa çalışacağım” demesin diye.

value: Yes indeed (you did get enough chances). My proofs came to you, but you rejected them, turned arrogant, and became a disbeliever.
YENİSİ: Evet gerçekten de (yeterince şansın oldu). Benim kanıtlarım sana geldi, fakat sen onları reddettin, kibirlendin ve inkârcı biri oldun.

value: On the Day of Resurrection you will see the faces of those who lied about GOD covered with misery. Is Hell not the right retribution for the arrogant ones?
YENİSİ: Diriliş Günü’nde, TANRI hakkında yalan söyleyenlerin yüzlerinin perişanlıkla kaplandığını göreceksin. Cehennem kibirli olanlar için uygun azap değil midir?

value: And GOD will save those who have maintained righteousness; He will reward them. No harm will touch them, nor will they have any grief.
YENİSİ: Ve TANRI doğruluğu sürdürmüş olanları kurtaracaktır; O onları ödüllendirecektir. Onlara hiçbir zarar dokunmayacaktır, onların herhangi bir üzüntüsü de olmayacaktır.

value: GOD is the Creator of all things, and He is in full control of all things.
YENİSİ: TANRI her şeyin Yaratıcısıdır ve O, her şeyde tam kontrol durumundadır.

value: To Him belongs all decisions in the heavens and the earth, and those who disbelieve in GOD’s revelations are the real losers.
YENİSİ: Göklerdeki ve yeryüzündeki bütün kararlar O’na aittir ve gerçek kaybedenler TANRI’nın vahiylerini inkâr edenlerdir.

value: Say, “Is it other than GOD you exhort me to worship, O you ignorant ones?”
YENİSİ: De ki: “Beni TANRI’dan başkasına tapmaya mı teşvik ediyorsunuz, Ey cahiller?”

value: It has been revealed to you, and to those before you that if you ever commit idol worship, all your works will be nullified, and you will be with the losers.
Human Fickleness
God’s Infinite Mercy
YENİSİ: Tanrı’nın Sonsuz Merhameti

value: Idol Worship Nullifies All Work
The Throngs (Al-Zumar) 39:66-75
YENİSİ: Yığınlar (El-Zümer) 39:66-75

value: Therefore, you shall worship GOD alone, and be appreciative.

They can never fathom the greatness of GOD. The whole earth is within His fist on the Day of Resurrection. In fact, the universes are folded within His right hand.* Be He glorified; He is much too high above needing any partners.
YENİSİ: Onlar TANRI’nın büyüklüğünü asla idrak edemezler. Diriliş Günü’nde bütün yeryüzü O’nun yumruğu içindedir. Aslında, evrenler O’nun sağ elinin içinde dürülmüştür.* O’na yücelik olsun. O, herhangi bir ortağa ihtiyaç duymanın çok üstündedir.

value: The horn will be blown, whereupon everyone in the heavens and the earth will be struck unconscious, except those who will be spared by GOD. Then it will be blown another time, whereupon they will all rise up, looking.*
YENİSİ: Sur üflenecek, bunun üzerine TANRI tarafından esirgenenler hariç göklerde ve yeryüzünde bulunan herkes baygın düşecek. Sonra o bir kez daha üflenecek, bunun üzerine hepsi bakınır hâlde kalkacaklar.*

value: Then the earth will shine with the light of its Lord. The record will be proclaimed, and the prophets and the witnesses will be brought forth. Everyone will then be judged equitably, without the least injustice.
Every soul will be paid for whatever it did, for He is fully aware of everything they have done.

Those who disbelieved will be led to Hell in throngs. When they get to it, and its gates are opened, its guards will say, “Did you not receive messengers from among you, who recited to you the revelations of your Lord, and warned you about meeting this day?” They will answer, “Yes indeed. But the word ‘retribution’ was already stamped upon the disbelievers.”
It will be said, “Enter the gates of Hell, wherein you abide forever.” What a miserable destiny for the arrogant.
YENİSİ: Denilecek ki: “İçinde sonsuza dek kalacağınız Cehennemin kapılarından girin.” Kibirliler için ne sefil bir kader.

value: Those who reverenced their Lord will be led to Paradise in throngs. When they get to it, and its gates are opened, its guards will say, “Peace be upon you; you have won. Therefore, you abide herein forever.”
They will say, “Praise be to GOD, who fulfilled His promise to us, and made us inherit the earth, enjoying Paradise as we please.” What a beautiful recompense for the workers!
You will see the angels floating around the throne, glorifying and praising their Lord. After the equitable judgment is issued to all, it will be proclaimed: “Praise be to GOD, Lord of the universe.”
Greatness of God*
YENİSİ: Tanrı’nın Büyüklüğü*

value: The Day of Judgment
YENİSİ: Yargı Günü

value: The Disbelievers
YENİSİ: İnkârcılar

value: The Believers
YENİSİ: İnananlar

value: *39:67 Our universe, with its billion galaxies, a billion trillion stars, uncountable decillions of heavenly bodies, spanning many billions of light-years, is the smallest and innermost of seven universes. This incomprehensible vastness of the seven universes is within God’s hand. Such is the greatness of God. See Appendix 6.

*39:68 The sequence of events on the Day of Resurrection begins with the symbolic blowing of the horn. The second blowing of the horn—by a creature who was spared from unconsciousness—marks the resurrection of all people; they will be resurrected on today’s earth. This earth will then be destroyed by the physical coming of God, then a new earth and new heavens will be created (14:48). We will then be stratified according to our degree of development (Appendix 11).
YENİSİ: *39:68 Diriliş Günü’ndeki olaylar dizisi, sembolik sur üflenmesiyle başlar. Surun—baygınlıktan korunan bir yaratık tarafından—ikinci üflenişi, tüm insanların dirilişine işaret eder; onlar bugünün dünyasında diriltilecekler. Ardından bu dünya, Tanrı’nın fiziksel gelişiyle yıkılacak, sonra yeni bir dünya ve yeni gökler yaratılacaktır (14:48). Ardından bizler gelişim derecemize göre katmanlara ayrılacağız (Ek 11).

value: Forgiver (Ghãfer) 40:1-12
YENİSİ: Bağışlayıcı (Ğafir) 40:1-12

value: H.M.*
YENİSİ: H.M.*

value: This revelation of the scripture is from GOD, the Almighty, the Omniscient.
Forgiver of sins, acceptor of repentance, strict in enforcing retribution, and possessor of all power. There is no other god beside Him. To Him is the ultimate destiny.
None argues against GOD’s revelations except those who disbelieve. Do not be impressed by their apparent success.
YENİSİ: İnkâr edenler dışında hiç kimse TANRI’nın vahiylerinin aleyhinde olmaz. Onların görünürdeki başarısından etkilenme.

value: Disbelieving before them were the people of Noah, and many other opponents after them. Every community persecuted their messenger to neutralize him. And they argued with falsehood, to defeat the truth. Consequently, I punished them; how terrible was My retribution!
YENİSİ: Onlardan önce Nuh halkı ve onlardan sonra da nice muhalifler inkârdaydılar. Her topluluk elçisini etkisiz hale getirmek için ona zulmetti. Ve hakikati yenmek için yalanla tartıştılar. Bunun sonucunda Ben onları cezalandırdım; Benim azabım nasıl da korkunçtu!

value: Thus, the judgment of your Lord is already stamped upon those who disbelieve, that they are the dwellers of Hell.

Those who serve the throne and all those around it glorify and praise their Lord, and believe in Him. And they ask forgiveness for those who believe: “Our Lord, Your mercy and Your knowledge encompass all things. Forgive those who repent and follow Your path, and spare them the retribution of Hell.
“Our Lord, and admit them into the gardens of Eden that You promised for them and for the righteous among their parents, spouses, and children. You are the Almighty, Most Wise.
YENİSİ: “Rabbimiz, Senin onlara ve ebeveynleri, eşleri ve evlatları arasında doğru olanlara vadettiğin Aden bahçelerine onları kabul et. Sen Kudretlisin, En Bilge Olansın.

value: “And protect them from falling in sin. Whomever You protect from falling in sin, on that day, has attained mercy from You. This is the greatest triumph.”
YENİSİ: “Ve onları günaha düşmekten koru. Senin günaha düşmekten koruduğun kimse, o gün, Senden merhamete erişmiştir. İşte en büyük zafer budur.”

value: Those who disbelieve will be told, “GOD’s abhorrence towards you is even worse than your own abhorrence towards yourselves. For you were invited to believe, but you chose to disbelieve.”
YENİSİ: İnkâr edenlere denilecek ki: “TANRI’nın size karşı iğrenmesi, sizin kendinize karşı iğrenmenizden bile daha ağırdır. Zira siz inanmaya davet edildiniz, fakat inkâr etmeyi seçtiniz.”

value: They will say, “Our Lord, you have put us to death twice, * and You gave us two lives; now we have confessed our sins. Is there any way out?”
YENİSİ: Onlar diyecekler ki: “Rabbimiz, bizi iki kez ölüme koydun* ve bize iki hayat verdin; artık günahlarımızı itiraf ettik. Herhangi bir çıkış yolu var mı?”

value: This is because when GOD ALONE was advocated, you disbelieved, but when others were mentioned beside Him, you believed. Therefore, GOD’s judgment has been issued; He is the Most High, the Great.
YENİSİ: Bunun nedeni şudur: YALNIZCA TANRI savunulduğunda inkâr ettiniz, fakat O’nun yanında başkaları anıldığında inandınız. Haliyle de TANRI’nın hükmü verilmiş bulunmaktadır; O Yüceler Yücesidir, Büyüktür.

value: God ALONE: Note the Reason
*40:1 The initials “Hã Mîm” occur in Suras 40-46, The total frequency of occurrence of the letters “Ha” and “Mîm” in the seven suras is 2147, or 19x113 (Appendix 1).
YENİSİ: *40:1 “Ha Mim” başlangıç harfleri 40-46. surelerde geçmektedir. “Ha” ve “Mim” harflerinin yedi surede geçiş sıklığı 2147 veya 19x113’tür (Ek 1).

value: *40:11-12 The disbelievers go through two deaths, while the righteous believers do not taste death, beyond the death we already experienced (44:56). Please see Appendix 17. The reason for going to Hell is obvious; even those who believe in God associate others with Him (see 39:45).
Forgiver (Ghãfer) 40:13-28
YENİSİ: Bağışlayıcı (Ğafir) 40:13-28

value: He is the One who continuously shows you His proofs, and sends down to you from the sky provisions. Only those who totally submit will be able to take heed.
Therefore, you shall devote your worship absolutely to GOD ALONE, even if the disbelievers dislike it.
Possessor of the highest ranks, and Ruler of the whole dominion. He sends inspiration, bearing His commands, to whomever He chooses from among His servants, to warn about the Day of Summoning.
YENİSİ: En yüksek derecelerin Sahibi ve tüm egemenliğin Hükümdarı. O, kulları arasından kimi seçerse ona, Toplanma Günü hakkında uyarmak için, O'nun emirlerini taşıyan ilhamı gönderir.

value: That is the day when everyone will be completely exposed; none of them will hide anything from GOD. To whom belongs all sovereignty on that day? To GOD, the One, the Supreme.
YENİSİ: Bu, herkesin büsbütün ifşa olacağı gündür; onların hiçbiri, TANRI’dan hiçbir şey saklayamayacaktır. O gün bütün hükümranlık kime aittir? Tek ve En Üstün Olan TANRI’ya.

value: On that day, every soul will be requited for whatever it had earned. There will be no injustice on that day. GOD is most efficient in reckoning.
YENİSİ: O gün, her nefse kazanmış olduğu her şey için karşılığı verilecektir. O gün, hiç adaletsizlik olmayacaktır. TANRI hesap görmede en etkin olandır.

value: Warn them about the imminent day, when the hearts will be terrified, and many will be remorseful. The transgressors will have no friend nor an intercessor to be obeyed.
He is fully aware of what the eyes cannot see, and everything that the minds conceal.
GOD judges equitably, while the idols they implore beside Him cannot judge anything. GOD is the One who is the Hearer, the Seer.

Did they not roam the earth and note the consequences for those before them? They used to be stronger than they, and more productive on earth. But GOD punished them for their sins, and nothing could protect them from GOD.
That is because their messengers went to them with clear proofs, but they disbelieved. Consequently, GOD punished them. He is Mighty, strict in enforcing retribution.
We sent Moses with our signs and a profound authority.
To Pharaoh, Hãmãn, and Qãroon But they said, “A magician; a liar.”
And when he showed them the truth from us, they said, “Kill the sons of those who believed with him, and spare their daughters.” Thus, the scheming of the disbelievers is always wicked.
YENİSİ: Ve o, bizden gelen hakikati onlara gösterdiğinde dediler ki: “Onunla birlikte inananların oğullarını öldürün ve kızlarını sağ bırakın.” Nitekim inkârcıların planlaması hep kötüdür.

value: Pharaoh said, “Let me kill Moses, and let him implore his Lord. I worry lest he corrupts your religion, or spreads evil throughout the land.”
YENİSİ: Firavun dedi ki: “Bırakın Musa’yı öldüreyim ve o da varsın Rabbine yalvarsın. Ya dininizi bozar ya da yeryüzünde kötülük yayar diye endişeleniyorum.”

value: Moses said, “I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord, from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Reckoning.”
YENİSİ: Musa dedi ki “Hesap Günü’ne inanmayan her bir kibirliden, Rabbime ve Rabbinize sığınıyorum.”

value: A believing man among Pharaoh’s people, who was concealing his belief, said, “How can you kill a man just for saying, ‘My Lord is GOD,’ and he has shown you clear proofs from your Lord? If he is a liar, that is his problem, and if he is truthful, you benefit from his promises. Surely, GOD does not guide any transgressor, liar.
YENİSİ: Firavun’un adamlarından, inandığı hâlde inancını gizleyen bir adam dedi ki: “Siz bir adamı, sırf ‘Benim Rabbim TANRI’dır’ dediği için, hem de size Rabbinizden apaçık kanıtlar göstermişken nasıl öldürebilirsiniz? Eğer o bir yalancıysa bu onun problemidir ve eğer o doğru sözlü ise siz onun vaatlerinden faydalanırsınız. Şüphesiz, TANRI hiçbir yalancı haddi aşana rehberlik etmez.

value: Prepare for the Big Day
No Intercession
Moses
YENİSİ: Musa

value: Moses vs. Pharaoh
God Guides Not the Liars
Forgiver (Ghãfer) 40:29-41
YENİSİ: Bağışlayıcı (Ğafir) 40:29-41

value: “O my people, today you have kingship and the upperhand. But who will help us against GOD’s judgment, should it come to us?” Pharaoh said, “You are to follow only what I see fit; I will guide you only in the right path.”
YENİSİ: “Ey halkım, iktidar ve üstünlük bugün sizdedir. Fakat TANRI’nın hükmü başımıza gelirse, karşısında bize kim yardım edecek?” Firavun dedi ki: “Sadece benim uygun gördüğüme uyacaksınız; size ben sadece doğru yolda rehberlik edeceğim.”

value: The one who believed said, “O my people, I fear for you the same fate as the previous opponents.
YENİSİ: İnananlardan biri dedi ki: “Ey halkım, sizin için, önceki muhaliflerin uğradığıyla aynı akıbetten korkuyorum.

value: “The opponents of Noah, and ‘Ãd, Thamoud, and others who came after them. GOD does not wish any injustice for the people.
YENİSİ: “Nuh’un muhalifleri ve Âd, Semûd ve onlardan sonra gelen diğerleri. TANRI insanlar için herhangi bir haksızlık dilemez.

value: “O my people, I fear for you the Day of Summoning.
YENİSİ: “Ey halkım, sizin için Toplanma Günü’nden korkuyorum.

value: “That is the day when you may wish to turn around and flee. But nothing will protect you then from GOD. Whomever GOD sends astray, nothing can guide him.”
YENİSİ: “O, arkanızı dönüp kaçmak isteyebileceğiniz gündür. Fakat o zaman hiçbir şey sizi TANRI’dan korumayacaktır. TANRI kimi saptırırsa, hiçbir şey ona rehberlik edemez.”

value: Joseph had come to you before that with clear revelations, but you continued to doubt his message. Then, when he died you said, “GOD will not send any other messenger after him. (He was the last messenger)!”** GOD thus sends astray those who are transgressors, doubtful.
They argue against GOD’s revelations, without any basis. This is a trait that is most abhorred by GOD and by those who believe. GOD thus seals the hearts of every arrogant tyrant.
YENİSİ: Onlar, herhangi bir dayanağı olmaksızın TANRI’nın vahiylerinin aleyhinde tartışırlar. Bu, TANRI ve inananlar tarafından en iğrenilen bir niteliktir. TANRI, her kibirli zorbanın kalbini işte böyle mühürler.

value: Pharaoh said, “O Hãmãn, build for me a high tower, that I may reach out and discover.
YENİSİ: Firavun dedi ki: “Ey Haman, benim için yüksek bir kule inşa et ki erişip keşfedeyim.

value: “I want to reach the heaven, and take a look at the god of Moses. I believe he is a liar.” Thus were the evil works of Pharaoh adorned in his eyes, and thus was he kept from following (the right) path. Pharaoh’s scheming was truly evil.
YENİSİ: “Göğe ulaşmak ve Musa’nın tanrısına bir göz atmak istiyorum. Ben onun bir yalancı olduğuna inanıyorum.” Böylece Firavun’un kötü işleri gözlerinde süslendi ve böylelikle (doğru) yolu izlemekten engellendi. Firavun’un planlaması hakikaten kötüydü.

value: The one who believed said, “O my people, follow me, and I will guide you in the right way.
“O my people, this first life is a temporary illusion, while the Hereafter is the eternal abode.”
Whoever commits a sin is requited for just that, and whoever works righteousness—male or female— while believing, these will enter Paradise wherein they receive provisions without any limits.
YENİSİ: Her bir günah işleyen yalnız bunun için karşılığını alır ve her—erkek veya kadın— inanıp doğrulukla çalışırsa, işte bunlar içinde sınırsız rızık alacakları Cennete gireceklerdir.

value: “O my people, while I invite you to be saved, you invite me to the hellfire.
Who is the Last Messenger?*\nA Tragic Human Trait
The Best Deal
The Believing Egyptian Debates With His People

*40:34 The Jews refused to believe in the Messiah when he came to them, the Christians refused to believe in Muhammad when he came to them, and a majority of today’s Muslims believe that Muhammad was the last messenger. On that erroneous basis, they refused to accept God’s Messenger of the Covenant. We learn from 3:81-90 and 33:7 that those who fail to accept the Quranic injunction to “believe in and support God’s Messenger of the Covenant” are no longer believers. See Appendices 2 & 26.
**40:34 It is noteworthy that we find the name “Rashad” in the Arabic text precisely four verses ahead of the injunction against saying “the last messenger,” and also four verses after it.
YENİSİ: **40:34 Dikkate değerdir ki, Arapça metinde “Reşad” ismini, “son elçi” demeyi yasaklayan uyarıdan tam olarak dört ayet önce ve ayrıca ondan dört ayet sonra buluyoruz.

value: Forgiver (Ghãfer) 40:42-58
YENİSİ: Bağışlayıcı (Ğafir) 40:42-58

value: “You invite me to be unappreciative of GOD, and to set up beside Him idols that I do not recognize. I am inviting you to the Almighty, the Forgiver.
“There is no doubt that what you invite me to do has no basis in this world, nor in the Hereafter, that our ultimate return is to GOD, and that the transgressors have incurred the hellfire.
“Some day you will remember what I am telling you now. I leave the judgment of this matter to GOD; GOD is the Seer of all the people.”
GOD then protected him from their evil schemes, while the people of Pharaoh have incurred the worst retribution.

YENİSİ: Cehennem onlara gece gündüz gösterilecek ve Diriliş Günü’nde ise: “Firavun’un adamlarını en kötü azabın içine alın.”

value: As they argue in Hell, the followers will say to their leaders, “We used to be your followers, can you spare us any part of this Hell?”
YENİSİ: Cehennem'de tartışırlarken, takipçiler liderlerine diyecekler ki: “Vaktiyle biz sizin takipçilerinizdik, bu Cehennem'in herhangi bir kısmını üzerimizden savabilir misiniz?”

value: The leaders will say, “We are all in this together. GOD has judged among the people.”
Those in the hellfire will say to the guardians of Hell, “Call upon your Lord to reduce the retribution for us, for even one day.”
YENİSİ: Cehennem ateşinde olanlar, Cehennemin bekçilerine diyecekler ki: “Rabbinize çağrıda bulunun da bizim için bu azabı bir günlüğüne dahi hafifletsin.”

value: They will say, “Did you not receive your messengers who delivered to you clear messages?” They will reply, “Yes we did.” They will say, “Then implore (as much as you wish); the imploring of the disbelievers is always in vain.”
YENİSİ: Onlar diyecekler ki: “Size apaçık mesajlar ileten elçileriniz gelmedi mi?” Onlar, “Evet, geldiler” diyerek yanıtlayacaklar. Onlar da, “O zaman (dilediğiniz kadar) yalvarın; inkârcıların yalvarışı daima boşunadır” diyecek.

value: Most assuredly, we will give victory to our messengers and to those who believe, both in this world and on the day the witnesses are summoned.
On that day, the apologies of the disbelievers will not benefit them. They have incurred condemnation; they have incurred the worst destiny.
We have given Moses the guidance, and made the Children of Israel inherit the scripture.
YENİSİ: Biz Musa’ya kılavuzu verdik ve İsrailoğullarını o kutsal yazıya vâris kıldık.

value: (Their history) is a lesson and a reminder for those who possess intelligence.
Therefore, be patient, for GOD’s promise is true, and ask forgiveness for your sin, and glorify and praise your Lord night and day.

Surely, those who argue against GOD’s revelations without proof are exposing the arrogance that is hidden inside their chests, and they are not even aware of it. Therefore, seek refuge in GOD; He is the Hearer, the Seer.
The creation of the heavens and the earth is even more awesome than the creation of the human being, but most people do not know.
Not equal are the blind and the seer Nor are those who believe and work righteousness equal to the sinners. Rarely do you take heed.

value: Most certainly, the Hour (Day of Judgment) is coming, no doubt about it, but most people do not believe.
Your Lord says, “Implore Me, and I will respond to you. Surely, those who are too arrogant to worship Me will enter Gehenna, forcibly.”
GOD is the One who designed the night so you can rest in it, and the day lighted. GOD bestows many blessings upon the people, but most people are not thankful.
Such is GOD your Lord, the Creator of all things. There is no god except He. How could you deviate?
Deviating are those who disregard GOD’s revelations.
YENİSİ: Sapmakta olanlar TANRI’nın vahiylerini göz ardı edenlerdir.

value: GOD is the One who rendered the earth habitable for you, and the sky a formidable structure, and He designed you, and designed you well. He is the One who provides you with good provisions.* Such is GOD your Lord; Most Exalted is GOD, Lord of the universe.
YENİSİ: Yeryüzünü sizin için yaşanabilir hâle getiren ve gökyüzünü heybetli bir yapı hâline getiren TANRI’dır; sizi de O tasarladı ve sizi güzel tasarladı. Size iyi rızıklar* sağlayan O’dur. İşte böyledir Rabbiniz TANRI; En Yücedir kâinatın Rabbi olan TANRI.

value: He is the Living; there is no god except He. You shall worship Him alone, devoting your religion absolutely to Him alone. Praise be to GOD, Lord of the universe.
Say, “I have been enjoined from worshiping the idols you worship beside GOD, when the clear revelations came to me from my Lord. I was commanded to submit to the Lord of the universe.”*

He is the One who created you from dust, and subsequently from a tiny drop, then from a hanging embryo, then He brings you out as a child, then He lets you reach maturity, then you become old—some of you die earlier. You attain a predetermined age, that you may understand.
He is the only One who controls life and death. To have anything done, He simply says to it, “Be,” and it is.
Have you noted those who argue against GOD’s proofs, and how they have deviated?
They are the ones who have disbelieved in the scripture, and in the messages we have sent with our messengers. Therefore, they will surely find out.
YENİSİ: Onlar, kutsal yazıyı ve elçilerimizle gönderdiğimiz mesajları inkâr etmiş olan kimselerdir. Bu nedenle, onlar ileride mutlaka öğrenecekler.

value: The shackles will be around their necks, and the chains will be used to drag them.

*40:60 Supplication, imploring God for anything, even material luxuries, is a form of worship. Hence the commandment to implore God whenever we have any need. An atheist will never implore God for anything.
YENİSİ: *40:60 Yakarış; Tanrı’ya herhangi bir şey için, hatta maddi lüksler için bile yalvarmak, bir tapınma biçimidir. Bu nedenle, herhangi bir ihtiyacımız olduğunda Tanrı’ya yalvarmamız buyurulmuştur. Bir ateist Tanrı’ya hiçbir şey için asla yalvarmayacaktır.

value: In the Inferno,* then in the Fire, they will burn.
They will be asked, “Where are the idols you used to worship,
“beside GOD?” They will say, “They have abandoned us. In fact, when we worshiped them, we were worshiping nothing.” Thus does GOD send the disbelievers astray.
This is because you used to rejoice in false doctrines, on earth, and you used to promote them.
Enter the gates of Gehenna, wherein you abide forever. What a miserable destiny for the arrogant ones.
YENİSİ: İçinde sonsuza dek kalacağınız Cehennemin kapılarından girin. Kibirli olanlar için ne sefil bir kader.

value: You shall be patient, for GOD’s promise is truth. Whether we show you some of (the retribution) we have promised for them, or terminate your life before that, they will be returned to us.
YENİSİ: Sabırlı ol zira TANRI’nın vaadi haktır. İster onlar için söz verdiğimiz (azabın) bir kısmını sana gösterelim ister bundan önce senin hayatına son verelim, onlar bize geri döndürüleceklerdir.

value: We have sent messengers before you—some of them we mentioned to you, and some we did not mention to you. No messenger can produce any miracle without GOD’s authorization.* Once GOD’s judgment is issued, the truth dominates, and the falsifiers are exposed and humiliated.
YENİSİ: Biz, senden önce de elçiler gönderdik—bazılarından sana bahsettik ve bazılarından sana bahsetmedik. TANRI’nın yetkilendirmesi olmaksızın hiç bir elçi tek bir mucize bile ortaya koyamaz.* TANRI’nın yargısı verildiğinde, hakikat egemen olur ve sahtekârlar ifşa edilir ve aşağılanırlar.

value: GOD is the One who created the livestock for you; some you ride, and some you eat.
They also provide you with additional benefits that satisfy many of your needs. On them, as well as on the ships, you are carried.
He thus shows you His proofs Which of GOD’s proofs can you deny?

Have they not roamed the earth and noted the consequences for those who preceded them? They used to be greater in number, greater in power, and possessed a greater legacy on earth. Yet, all their achievements did not help them in the least.
When their messengers went to them with clear proofs, they rejoiced in the knowledge they had inherited, and the very things they ridiculed were the cause of their fall.
Subsequently, when they saw our retribution they said, “Now we believe in GOD ALONE, and we now disbelieve in the idol worship that we used to practice.”
Their belief then could not help them in the least, once they saw our retribution. Such is GOD’s system that has been established to deal with His creatures; the disbelievers are always doomed.
YENİSİ: Azabımızı gördükleri anda, inançları o zaman onlara en ufak fayda sağlamadı. İşte, yaratıklarıyla ilgilenmek üzere kurulmuş olan TANRI’nın sistemi böyledir; inkârcılar daima mahkûm olurlar.

He placed on it stabilizers (mountains), made it productive, and He calculated its provisions in four days, to satisfy the needs of all its inhabitants.

value: Then He turned to the sky, when it was still gas, and said to it, and to the earth, “Come into existence, willingly or unwillingly.” They said, “We come willingly.”

Thus, He* completed the seven universes in two days, and set up the laws for every universe. And we* adorned the lowest universe with lamps, and placed guards around it. Such is the design of the Almighty, the Omniscient.

value: *41:9-10 The “days” of creation represent a yardstick. Thus, the physical universe was created in two days, while the calculation of provisions for all the creatures on earth required four. This also teaches us that there is life only on this planet Earth.

value: *41:12 God alone created the universe (18:51), but the angels participated in handling certain jobs in the lowest universe. Our universe cannot stand the physical presence of God (7:143). The plural tense acknowledges the angels’ role in our universe (Appendix 10).

value: As for ‘Ãd, they turned arrogant on earth, opposed the truth, and said, “Who is more powerful than we?” Did they not realize that GOD, who created them, is more powerful than they? They were unappreciative of our revelations.
YENİSİ: Âd’a gelince, yeryüzünde kibirlendiler, hakikate muhalefet ettiler ve dediler ki: “Kim bizden daha güçlüdür?” Onları yaratan TANRI’nın onlardan daha güçlü olduğunu fark etmediler mi? Onlar vahiylerimize karşı nankörlerdi.

value: Consequently, we sent upon them violent wind, for a few miserable days. We thus afflicted them with humiliating retribution in this life, and the retribution of the Hereafter is more humiliating; they can never win.
YENİSİ: Sonuç olarak, onların üzerine birkaç sefil gün boyunca şiddetli rüzgâr gönderdik. Biz böylece onlara bu hayatta aşağılayıcı bir azapla sıkıntı verdik, Ahiretin azabı ise daha aşağılayıcıdır; onlar asla kazanamazlar.

value: As for Thamoud, we provided them with guidance, but they preferred blindness over guidance. Consequently, the disastrous and shameful retribution annihilated them, because of what they earned.
YENİSİ: Semûd’a gelince, biz onlara kılavuz sağladık, fakat körlüğü kılavuza tercih ettiler. Sonuç olarak, kazandıklarından ötürü o felaket getiren ve utanç verici azap onları imha etti.

value: We always save those who believe and lead a righteous life.
The day will come when the enemies of GOD will be summoned to the hellfire, forcibly.
Once they get there, their own hearing, eyes, and skins will bear witness to everything they had done.

They will say to their skins, “Why did you bear witness against us?” They will reply, “GOD made us speak up; He is the One who causes everything to speak. He is the One who created you the first time, and now you have been returned to Him.”
There is no way you can hide from your own hearing, your eyes, or your skins. In fact, you thought that GOD was unaware of much of what you do.
YENİSİ: Kendi duymanızdan, gözlerinizden veya derilerinizden saklanabilmenizin imkanı yok. Aslında siz yaptıklarınızın çoğundan TANRI’nın habersiz olduğunu sandınız.

value: This kind of thinking about your Lord will cause you to fall, and then you become losers.
If they continue the way they are, Hell will be their destiny, and if they make up excuses, they will not be excused.
YENİSİ: Eğer oldukları gibi devam ederlerse, Cehennem onların kaderi olacaktır ve eğer bahaneler uydururlarsa, mazur görülmeyeceklerdir.

value: We assign to them companions who adorn everything they do in their eyes. Thus, they end up incurring the same fate as the previous communities of jinns and humans, who were also losers.
YENİSİ: Biz onlara yaptıkları her şeyi gözlerinde süsleyen yoldaşlar tahsis ederiz. Böylece, sonunda onlar önceki cin ve insan topluluklarıyla aynı akıbete maruz kalırlar, ki onlar da kaybedenlerdi.

value: Those who disbelieved said, “Do not listen to this Quran and distort it, that you may win.”
YENİSİ: İnkâr etmiş olanlar dediler ki: “Bu Kuran’ı dinlemeyin ve onu tahrif edin ki kazanasınız.”

value: We will certainly afflict these disbelievers with a severe retribution. We will certainly requite them for their evil works.
YENİSİ: Biz mutlaka bu inkârcılara şiddetli bir azapla sıkıntı vereceğiz. Onlara kötü işlerinin karşılığını da kesinlikle vereceğiz.

value: Such is the requital that awaits GOD’s enemies. Hell will be their eternal abode; a just requital for discarding our revelations.
YENİSİ: TANRI’nın düşmanlarını bekleyen karşılık işte budur. Cehennem onların ebedi ikamet yeri olacaktır; vahiylerimizi bir kenara atmanın adil bir karşılığı.

value: “We are your allies in this life, and in the Hereafter. You will have in it anything you wish for; you will have anything you want.
“(Such is your) ultimate abode, from a Forgiver, Most Merciful.”
Who can utter better words than one who invites to GOD, works righteousness, and says, “I am one of the submitters?”
Not equal is the good response and the bad response. You shall resort to the nicest possible response. Thus, the one who used to be your enemy, may become your best friend.
None can attain this except those who steadfastly persevere. None can attain this except those who are extremely fortunate.
When the devil whispers an idea to you, you shall seek refuge in GOD. He is the Hearer, the Omniscient.
YENİSİ: Şeytan sana bir fikir fısıldadığında TANRI’ya sığın. O İşitendir, Her Şeyi Bilendir.

value: Among His proofs are the night and the day, and the sun and the moon. Do not prostrate before the sun, nor the moon; you shall fall prostrate before the GOD who created them, if you truly worship Him alone.
YENİSİ: Gece ve gündüz, güneş ve ay O’nun kanıtları arasındadır. Güneşin ya da ayın önünde secde etmeyin; onları yaratan TANRI’nın huzurunda secdeye kapanın, eğer hakikaten yalnızca O’na tapıyorsanız.

value: If they are too arrogant to do this, then those at your Lord glorify Him night and day, without ever tiring.
Among His proofs is that you see the land still, then, as soon as we shower it with water, it vibrates with life. Surely, the One who revived it can revive the dead. He is Omnipotent.

Surely, those who distort our revelations are not hidden from us. Is one who gets thrown into Hell better, or one who comes secure on the Day of Resurrection? Do whatever you wish; He is Seer of everything you do.
YENİSİ: Şüphesiz, vahiylerimizi tahrif edenler bizden saklı değildirler. Cehenneme atılan mı daha iyidir yoksa Diriliş Günü’nde güven içinde gelen mi? Dilediğinizi yapın; O, yaptığınız her şeyi Görendir.

value: Those who have rejected the Quran’s proof* when it came to them, have also rejected an Honorable book.
No falsehood could enter it, in the past or in the future;* a revelation from a Most Wise, Praiseworthy.
YENİSİ: Geçmişte veya gelecekte, hiçbir yalan ona giremez;* bir En Bilge Olandan, Övgüye Layık Olandan gelen bir vahiy.

value: What is said to you is precisely what was said to the previous messengers. Your Lord possesses forgiveness, and He also possesses painful retribution.
YENİSİ: Sana söylenen şey, tam olarak önceki elçilere söylenen şeydir. Senin Rabbin bağışlamanın sahibidir ve O ayrıca acı veren azabın da sahibidir.

value: Submitters
When the Devil Entices You
Proofs of God
YENİSİ: Tanrı’nın Kanıtları

value: Mathematical Miracle\nof the Quran*
God’s Messenger\nof the Covenant*
*41:41 The word “Zikr” refers to the Quran’s mathematical code, as made clear in 38:1.
*41:42 One of the major functions of the Quran’s mathematical miracle is to guard every letter and every aspect of the Quran. Thus, any tampering is immediately recognized (Apps. 1 & 24).

*41:43 Mathematical proof shows that this verse refers to God’s Messenger of the Covenant. By adding the gematrical value of “Rashad”(505), plus the value of “Khalifa” (725), plus this verse number (43), we get 505 + 725 + 43 = 1273 = 19x67. See Appendix 2.
Detailed (Fussilat) 41:44-54
YENİSİ: Detaylandırılmış (Fussilet) 41:44-54

value: If we made it a non-Arabic Quran they would have said, “Why did it come down in that language?” Whether it is Arabic or non-Arabic, say, “For those who believe, it is a guide and healing. As for those who disbelieve, they will be deaf and blind to it, as if they are being addressed from faraway.”
YENİSİ: Eğer onu Arapça olmayan bir Kuran yapsaydık, şöyle diyeceklerdi: “O neden o dilde indirildi?” İster Arapça olsun ister Arapça olmasın, de ki: “İnananlar için o, bir rehber ve bir şifadır. İnkâr edenlere gelince, ona karşı sağır ve kör olacaklardır, sanki kendilerine çok uzaklardan sesleniliyormuş gibi.”

value: We have given Moses the scripture and it was also disputed. If it were not for your Lord’s predetermined decision, they would have been judged immediately. Indeed, they harbor too many doubts.
Whoever works righteousness, does so for his own good, and whoever works evil does so to his own detriment. Your Lord is never unjust towards the people.

With Him is the knowledge about the Hour (end of the world).* No fruits emerge from their sheaths, nor does any female conceive or give birth, without His knowledge. The day will come when He asks them: “Where are those idols that you set up beside Me?” They will say, “We proclaim to You that none of us bears witness to that.”
The idols they had idolized will disown them, and they will realize that there will be no escape.
YENİSİ: Tapmış oldukları putlar onları sahiplenmeyecekler ve onlar hiçbir kaçış olmadığının farkına varacaklar.

value: The human being never tires of imploring for good things. And when adversity befalls him, he turns despondent, desperate.

And when we bless him after suffering some adversity, he says, “This belongs to me. I do not believe that the Hour will ever come to pass. Even if I am returned to my Lord, I will find at Him better things.” Most certainly, we will inform the disbelievers of all their works, and will commit them to severe retribution.
When we bless the human being, he turns away, and drifts farther and farther away, and when he suffers any affliction, he implores loudly.
Proclaim: “What if this is truly from GOD, then you decide to reject it? Who are farther astray than those who decide to oppose this?”
YENİSİ: İlan et: “Ya bu hakikaten TANRI’dansa sonra da onu reddetmeye karar verirseniz? Buna muhalefet etmeye karar verenlerden daha çok sapmış olan kimlerdir?”

value: We will show them our proofs in the horizons, and within themselves, until they realize that this is the truth.* Is your Lord not sufficient, as a witness of all things?
YENİSİ: Biz kanıtlarımızı onlara ufuklarda ve kendilerinde göstereceğiz, ta ki onlar bunun hakikatin ta kendisi olduğunu anlayıncaya dek.* Senin Rabbin her şeye bir şahit olarak yetmez mi?

value: Indeed, they are doubtful about meeting their Lord. He is fully aware of all things.
Language is Irrelevant
YENİSİ: Dil Alakasızdır

value: Idols Disown Their Followers
YENİSİ: Putlar Takipçilerini Sahiplenmezler

value: Bad Weather Friends
A Great Prophecy*
*41:47 God has revealed this knowledge through His Messenger of the Covenant (Appendix 25).

*41:53 The letters that compose this verse are 19, and their gematrical values add up to 1387, 19x73. This great prophecy, together with 9:33, 48:28, 61:9 & 110:2 inform us that the whole world is destined to accept the Quran as God’s unaltered message (See Appendix 38).
Consultation (Al-Shoorã) 42:1-14
YENİSİ: İstişare (El-Şura) 42:1-14

value: H.M.*
YENİSİ: H.M.*

value: Inspiring you, and those before you, is GOD, the Almighty, Most Wise.
To Him belongs everything in the heavens and everything on earth, and He is the Most High, the Great.

The heavens above them almost shatter, out of reverence for Him, and the angels praise and glorify their Lord, and they ask forgiveness for those on earth. Absolutely, GOD is the Forgiver, Most Merciful.
Those who set up other lords beside Him, GOD is the One in charge of them; you are not their advocate.
YENİSİ: O’nun yanında başka rabler edinenlere gelince, onları gözetimi altında tutan TANRI’dır; sen onların savunucusu değilsin.

value: We thus reveal to you an Arabic Quran to warn the central community and all around it, and to warn about the Day of Summoning that is inevitable. Some will end up in Heaven, and some in Hell.
YENİSİ: Böylece, biz merkez topluluğu ve çevresindekilerin hepsini uyarman ve kaçınılmaz olan Toplanma Günü hakkında uyarman için sana Arapça bir Kuran vahyediyoruz. Bazıları sonunda Cennet'te ve bazıları da Cehennem'de olacak.

value: Had GOD willed, He could have made them one community. But He redeems into His mercy whomever He wills. As for the transgressors, they have no master, nor a helper.
YENİSİ: TANRI irade etmiş olsaydı, onları tek bir topluluk yapabilirdi. Fakat O her kimi irade ederse, onu O'nun merhametine kurtarır. Haddi aşanlara gelince, onların sahibi yoktur, bir yardımcısı da yoktur.

value: Did they find other lords beside Him? GOD is the only Lord and Master. He is the One who resurrects the dead, and He is the Omnipotent One.
YENİSİ: O’nun yanında başka rabler mi buldular? TANRI tek Rab ve Sahiptir. Ölüleri dirilten O'dur ve O, Her Şeye Gücü Yetendir.

value: If you dispute any part of this message, the judgment for doing this rests with GOD. Such is GOD my Lord. In Him I trust, and to Him I submit.
YENİSİ: Eğer bu mesajın herhangi bir kısmına itiraz ederseniz, bu yapılanın hükmü TANRI’ya aittir. İşte Rabbim TANRI böyledir. Ben O’na güveniyorum ve O’na teslim oluyorum.

value: Initiator of the heavens and the earth. He created for you from among yourselves spouses—and also for the animals. He thus provides you with the means to multiply. There is nothing that equals Him. He is the Hearer, the Seer.
YENİSİ: Gökleri ve yeryüzünü Başlatan. O, kendi aranızdan sizin için eşler yarattı—ve ayrıca hayvanlar için de. O böylece size çoğalmanız için gereken imkânları sağlar. O’na denk hiçbir şey yoktur. O İşitendir, Görendir.

value: To Him belongs absolute control of the heavens and the earth. He is the One who increases the provision for whomever He wills, or reduces it. He is fully aware of all things.

He decreed for you the same religion decreed for Noah, and what we inspired to you, and what we decreed for Abraham, Moses, and Jesus: “You shall uphold this one religion, and do not divide it.”

Monotheists vs. Idol Worshipers
The idol worshipers will greatly resent what you invite them to do. GOD redeems to Himself whomever He wills; He guides to Himself only those who totally submit.
YENİSİ:
O, Nuh için hükme bağlanan dini sizin için de hükme bağladı ve sana ilham ettiğimiz, İbrahim, Musa ve İsa için de hükme bağladığımız şuydu: “Bu tek dine bağlı kalın ve onu bölmeyin.” 

Tektanrıcılar / Puta Tapanlar
Kendilerini yapmaya davet ettiğin şey, puta tapanların ağrına gidecektir. TANRI irade ettiği kimseyi Kendisine kavuşturur; O sadece tamamen teslim olanları Kendisine yönlendirir.

value: Ironically, they broke up into sects only after the knowledge had come to them, due to jealousy and resentment among themselves. If it were not for a predetermined decision from your Lord to respite them for a definite interim, they would have been judged immediately. Indeed, the later generations who inherited the scripture are full of doubts.
YENİSİ: İronik bir şekilde, onlara bilgi geldikten sonra kendi aralarındaki kıskançlık ve kin nedeniyle mezheplere ayrıldılar. Eğer onlara belirli bir geçici süre için, mühlet vermeye dair, Rabbinin önceden belirlenmiş bir kararı olmasaydı, derhâl yargılanmış olurlardı. Gerçekten de, kutsal yazıyı miras alan sonraki nesiller şüphe ile doludurlar.

value: None Equals God
Only One Religion
YENİSİ: Tek Bir Din

value: *42:1 These initials constitute a significant part of the Quran’s miracle (Footnote 40:1).

*42:2 This is the only sura where we see the initials ‘A.S.Q. (‘Ayn Seen Qaf), and the total occurrence of these three letters in this sura is 209, 19x11. Also, the letter “Q” occurs in this sura 57 times, 19x3. The only other sura where we see the initial “Q” is Sura 50, and this letter occurs in that sura also 57 times (See Appendix 1).
YENİSİ: *42:2 Bu ‘A.S.Q (Ayn, Sin, Qaf) başlangıç harflerini gördüğümüz tek suredir ve bu üç başlangıç harfinin bu suredeki toplam geçişi 209, 19x11’dir. Ayrıca, “Q” harfi bu surede 57, 19x3 kez geçer. “Q” başlangıç harfini gördüğümüz diğer tek sure 50. suredir ve bu harf o surede de 57 kez geçmektedir (Ek 1’e bakınız).

value: Consultation (Al-Shoorã) 42:15-23
YENİSİ: İstişare (El-Şura) 42:15-23

value: This is what you shall preach, and steadfastly maintain what you are commanded to do, and do not follow their wishes. And proclaim: “I believe in all the scriptures sent down by GOD. I was commanded to judge among you equitably. GOD is our Lord and your Lord. We have our deeds and you have your deeds. There is no argument between us and you. GOD will gather us all together; to Him is the ultimate destiny.”
YENİSİ: İşte bunu vaaz et, ve emrolunduğun şeyi kararlılıkla sürdür ve onların isteklerine uyma. Ve ilan et: “Ben TANRI tarafından indirilmiş bütün kutsal yazılara inanıyorum. Aranızda adil bir şekilde hüküm vermekle emrolundum. TANRI bizim de Rabbimiz sizin de Rabbinizdir. Bizim eylemlerimiz bize ve sizin eylemleriniz size. Bizimle sizin aranızda hiçbir tartışma yoktur. TANRI hepimizi bir araya toplayacaktır; nihai varış O’nadır.”

value: Those who argue about GOD, after receiving His message, their argument is nullified at their Lord. They have incurred condemnation, and have deserved a severe retribution.
GOD is the One who sent down the scripture, to deliver the truth and the law. For all that you know, the Hour (Day of Judgment) may be very close.
Challenging it are those who do not believe in it. As for those who believe, they are concerned about it, and they know that it is the truth. Absolutely, those who deny the Hour have gone far astray.
GOD is fully aware of all His creatures; He provides for whomever He wills. He is the Powerful, the Almighty.
YENİSİ: TANRI tüm yaratıklarının tamamen farkındadır; O irade ettiği kimseye rızık sağlar. O Güçlüdür, Kudretlidir.

value: Whoever seeks the rewards of the Hereafter, we multiply the rewards for him. And whoever seeks the materials of this world, we give him therefrom, then he receives no share in the Hereafter.
YENİSİ: Her kim Ahiretin ödüllerini ararsa onun için ödülleri çoğaltırız. Ve her kim bu dünyanın metalarını ararsa ona da ondan veririz, sonuçta o, Ahirette hiçbir pay almaz.

value: They follow idols who decree for them religious laws never authorized by GOD. If it were not for the predetermined decision, they would have been judged immediately. Indeed, the transgressors have incurred a painful retribution.*

You will see the transgressors worried about everything they had committed; everything will come back and haunt them. As for those who believed and led a righteous life, they will be in the gardens of Paradise. They will receive whatever they wish from their Lord. This is the great blessing.

This is the good news from GOD to His servants who believe and lead a righteous life. Say, “I do not ask you for any wage. I do ask each of you to take care of your own relatives.” Anyone who does a righteous work, we multiply his reward for it. GOD is Forgiver, Appreciative.
Message to the Christians\nand the Jews
YENİSİ: Hristiyanlara ve Yahudilere\nMesaj

value: The Believers Mindful\nof the Day of Judgment
YENİSİ: İnananlar\nYargı Günü’ne Dikkat Eder

value: The Idols:\nInnovating New Religious Laws*
YENİSİ: Putlar:\nYeni Dini Yasalar İcat Eder*

value: *42:21 The Islam of today’s Muslim world has been so distorted, it has become a Satanic cult. The Ulama, or religious scholars, have added many extraneous laws, prohibitions, dress codes, dietary regulations, and religious practices never authorized by God. This is one of the main reasons for sending God’s Messenger of the Covenant (9:31, 33:67, and Appendix 33).
YENİSİ: *42:21 Bugünün Müslüman dünyasının İslam’ı o kadar tahrif edilmiştir ki, Şeytani bir kült hâline gelmiştir. Ulema, yani din âlimleri, Tanrı tarafından asla yetkilendirilmemiş pek çok fazladan yasa, yasak, kıyafet kuralı, beslenme düzenlemesi, ve dini uygulamalar eklemişlerdir. Bu, Tanrı’nın Antlaşma Elçisi’nin gönderilmesinin başlıca nedenlerinden biridir (9:31, 33:67, ve Ek 33).

value: Consultation (Al-Shoorã) 42:24-40
YENİSİ: İstişare (El-Şura) 42:24-40

value: Are they saying, “He (Rashad)* has fabricated lies about GOD!”? If GOD willed, He could have sealed your mind, but GOD erases the falsehood and affirms the truth with His words. He is fully aware of the innermost thoughts.
YENİSİ: Onlar, “O (Reşad),* TANRI hakkında yalanlar uydurmuştur!” mu diyorlar? Eğer TANRI irade etseydi senin zihnini mühürleyebilirdi, fakat TANRI yalanı siler ve Kendi kelimeleriyle hakikati tasdik eder. O, en içteki düşüncelerin tamamen farkındadır.

value: He is the One who accepts the repentance from His servants, and remits the sins. He is fully aware of everything you do.
YENİSİ: O’nun kullarından tövbeyi kabul eden ve günahları örten O'dur. O, yaptığınız her şeyin tamamen farkındadır.

value: Responding to Him are those who believe and lead a righteous life. He will shower them with His blessings. As for the disbelievers, they have incurred a severe retribution.
If GOD increased the provision for His servants, they would transgress on earth. This is why He sends it precisely measured to whomever He wills. He is fully Cognizant and Seer of His servants.
YENİSİ: Eğer TANRI, O'nun kulları için rızkı çoğaltsaydı yeryüzünde haddi aşarlardı. Bu nedenle, O, irade ettiği kimseye onu tam ölçüsünde gönderir. O, kullarından tamamen Haberdardır ve onları Görendir.

value: He is the One who sends down the rain after they had despaired, and spreads His mercy. He is the only Master, Most Praiseworthy.
Among His proofs is the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the creatures He spreads in them. He is able to summon them, when He wills.
YENİSİ: Göklerin ve yeryüzünün yaratılışı ve onlarda yaydığı yaratıklar O’nun kanıtları arasındandır. O irade ettiği zaman onları toplayabilir.

value: Anything bad that happens to you is a consequence of your own deeds, and He overlooks many (of your sins).
YENİSİ: Başına gelen herhangi bir kötülük kendi eylemlerinizin bir sonucudur ve O (günahlarınızın) çoğunu görmezden gelir.

value: You can never escape, and you have none beside GOD as a Lord and Master.
Among His proofs are the ships that sail the sea with sails like flags.
If He willed, He could have stilled the winds, leaving them motionless on top of the water. These are proofs for those who are steadfast, appreciative.
He can annihilate them, as a consequence of their own works. Instead, He overlooks many (of their sins).
YENİSİ: O kendi işlerinin bir sonucu olarak onları imha edebilir. Bunun yerine, O (günahlarının) birçoğunu görmezden gelir.

value: Those who argue against our proofs will find out that they have no basis.
Whatever you are given is no more than temporary material of this life. What GOD possesses is far better and everlasting, for those who believe and trust in their Lord.
YENİSİ: Size her ne verilirse, bu hayatın geçici metasından fazlası değildir. İnanıp Rablerine güvenenler için TANRI’nın sahip olduğu çok daha iyidir ve kalıcıdır.

value: They avoid gross sins and vice, and when angered they forgive.
YENİSİ: Onlar büyük günahlardan ve ahlaksızlıktan kaçınırlar ve öfkelendikleri zaman bağışlarlar.

value: They respond to their Lord by observing the Contact Prayers (Salat). Their affairs are decided after due consultation among themselves, and from our provisions to them they give (to charity).
YENİSİ: Onlar İletişim Dualarını (Namazı) gözeterek Rablerine yanıt verirler. Onların meseleleri kendi aralarında istişarede bulunduktan sonra kararlaştırılır ve onlara sağladığımız rızıklardan (bağış) yaparlar.

value: When gross injustice befalls them, they stand up for their rights.
YENİSİ: Başlarına büyük bir haksızlık geldiğinde haklarını savunurlar.

value: Although the just requital for an injustice is an equivalent retribution, those who pardon and maintain righteousness are rewarded by GOD. He does not love the unjust.
YENİSİ: Her ne kadar bir haksızlığın adil karşılığı denk bir ceza olsa da, affedenler ve doğruluğu sürdürenler TANRI tarafından ödüllendirilirler. O, insafsızları sevmez.

value: God Erases the Falsehood and\nAffirms the Truth*
Only A Consequence
YENİSİ: Sadece Bir Sonuç

value: Traits of the Believers
YENİSİ: İnananların Nitelikleri

value: *42:24 The disbelievers added 2 false statements at the end of Sura 9 to commemorate their idol, the prophet Muhammad. God has revealed overwhelming evidence to erase this blasphemy and establish the truth. By adding the gematrical value of “Rashad Khalifa” (1230), plus the verse number (24), we get 1254, 19x66 (please see Appendices 2 & 24 for the details).
Consultation (Al-Shoorã) 42:41-53 & Ornaments (Al-Zukhruf) 43:1-2
YENİSİ: İstişare (El-Şura) 42:41-53 & Süs Eşyası (El-Zuhruf) 43:1-2

value: Certainly, those who stand up for their rights, when injustice befalls them, are not committing any error.
YENİSİ: Elbette, başlarına bir haksızlık geldiğinde haklarını savunanlar herhangi bir hata işlemiyorlar.

value: The wrong ones are those who treat the people unjustly, and resort to aggression without provocation. These have incurred a painful retribution.
YENİSİ: Yanlış olanlar, insanlara haksızca davranan ve kışkırtma olmaksızın saldırganlığa başvuranlardır. Bunlar acı veren bir azabı üzerlerine çekmişlerdir.

value: Resorting to patience and forgiveness reflects a true strength of character.
YENİSİ: Sabra ve bağışlamaya başvurmak, hakiki bir karakter gücünü yansıtır.

value: Whomever GOD sends astray will never find any other lord, and you will see such transgressors, when they see the retribution, saying, “Can we get another chance?”

You will see them facing it, humiliated and debased, and looking, yet trying to avoid looking. Those who believed will proclaim: “The real losers are those who lost their souls and their families on the Day of Resurrection. The transgressors have deserved an everlasting retribution.”
There will be no allies to help them against GOD. Whomever GOD sends astray can never be guided.
You shall respond to your Lord before a day comes which is decreed inevitable by GOD. There will be no refuge for you on that day, nor an advocate.
YENİSİ: TANRI tarafından kaçınılmaz olduğu karara bağlanmış olan bir gün gelmeden önce Rabbinize yanıt verin. O gün sizin için ne bir sığınak olacak, ne de bir savunucu.

value: If they turn away, we did not send you as their guardian. Your sole mission is delivering the message. When we shower the human beings with mercy, they become proud, and when adversity afflicts them, as a consequence of their own deeds, the human beings turn into disbelievers.
YENİSİ: Eğer yüz çevirirlerse, biz seni onların bekçisi olarak göndermedik. Senin tek görevin mesajı iletmektir. Biz insanlara merhamet yağdırdığımızda gururlanırlar ve kendi eylemlerinin bir sonucu olarak onlara sıkıntı dokunduğunda, insanlar inkârcı olurlar.

value: To GOD belongs the sovereignty of the heavens and the earth. He creates whatever He wills, granting daughters to whomever He wills, and granting sons to whomever He wills.
YENİSİ: Göklerin ve yeryüzünün hükümranlığı TANRI’ya aittir. O, irade ettiği kimseye kız evlatlar bahşederek ve irade ettiği kimseye oğullar bahşederek her neyi irade ederse onu yaratır.

value: Or, He may have the males and the females marry each other, then render whomever He wills sterile. He is Omniscient, Omnipotent.
No human being can communicate with GOD except through inspiration, or from behind a barrier, or by sending a messenger through whom He reveals what He wills. He is the Most High, Most Wise.
YENİSİ: Hiçbir insanoğlu, ilham yoluyla olması veya bir bariyer arkasından olması veya O’nun irade ettiği şeyi onun aracılığıyla vahyettiği bir elçi göndermesi dışında TANRI’yla haberleşemez. O, Yüceler Yücesidir ve En Bilge Olandır.

value: Thus, we inspired to you a revelation proclaiming our commandments. You had no idea about the scripture, or faith. Yet, we made this a beacon to guide whomever we choose from among our servants. Surely, you guide in a straight path.
YENİSİ: Böylece, biz sana buyruklarımızı ilan eden bir vahiy ilham ettik. Senin kutsal yazı ya da iman hakkında hiçbir fikrin yoktu. Elbette bunu, kullarımız arasından seçtiğimiz kimselere rehberlik etmek için bir işaret ışığı yaptık. Şüphesiz, sen dosdoğru bir yolda yönlendiriyorsun.

value: The path of GOD, to whom belongs everything in the heavens and everything on earth. Absolutely, all matters are controlled by GOD.
Sole Mission of the Messenger
How God Communicates With Us
H.M.*
YENİSİ: H.M.*

value: *43:1 See Footnote 40:1. The frequency of occurrence of the letters “H” (Hã) and “M” (Meem) in the seven H.M.-initialed suras is 292, and 1855, respectively. This adds up to 2147, or 19x113.
