value: The Walls (Al-Hujurãt) 49:15-18 & Q (Qãf) 50:1-17
YENİSİ: Duvarlar (El-Hucurat) 49:15-18 & Q (Kâf) 50:1-17

value: Mu’mens (believers) are those who believe in GOD and His messenger, then attain the status of having no doubt whatsoever, and strive with their money and their lives in the cause of GOD. These are the truthful ones.
YENİSİ: Mü’minler (inananlar), TANRI’ya ve elçisine inanan, sonra hiçbir şekilde şüphelerinin olmaması durumuna erişen ve TANRI yolunda mallarıyla ve canlarıyla çaba sarf eden kimselerdir. İşte bunlar doğru sözlü olanlardır.

value: Say, “Are you informing GOD about your religion? GOD knows everything in the heavens and the earth. GOD is Omniscient.”

They act as if they are doing you a favor by embracing Submission! Say, “You are not doing me any favors by embracing Submission. GOD is the One who is doing you a great favor by guiding you to the faith, if you are sincere.”
YENİSİ: Onlar Teslimiyeti benimseyerek sanki sana iyilik yapıyormuş gibi davranıyorlar! De ki: “Siz Teslimiyeti kabul etmekle bana hiçbir iyilik yapmıyorsunuz. Sizi imana yönlendirerek size büyük bir iyilik yapan TANRI'dır, eğer samimi iseniz.”

value: GOD knows all the secrets in the heavens and the earth; GOD is Seer of everything you do.
Who is Doing\nWhom A Favor?
YENİSİ: Kim Kime\nİyilik Yapıyor?

value: Q., and the glorious Quran.*
YENİSİ: Q. ve şanlı Kuran.*

value: They found it strange that a warner from among them came to them! The disbelievers said, “This is really strange.
YENİSİ: Onlar kendi aralarından bir uyarıcının kendilerine gelmesini tuhaf buldular! İnkârcılar dediler ki: “Bu gerçekten tuhaf.

value: “After we die and become dust; this is impossible.”
YENİSİ: “Biz öldükten ve toprak olduktan sonra; bu imkânsız.”

value: We are fully aware of any one of them who gets consumed by the earth; we have an accurate record.
They rejected the truth when it came to them; they are utterly confused.
Have they not looked at the sky above them, and how we constructed it and adorned it, without a flaw?
And we created the earth, and scattered on it mountains, and grew in it all kinds of beautiful plants.
This is an enlightenment, and a reminder for every pious worshiper.
YENİSİ: Bu bir aydınlatmadır ve tahva sahibi olan her tapınan için bir hatırlatıcıdır.

value: And we sent from the sky blessed water, to grow with it gardens and grains to be harvested.
Tall date palms, with clustered fruit.
Provisions for the people. And we revive with it dead lands; you are similarly resurrected.
Disbelieving before them were the people of Noah, the dwellers of Russ, and Thamoud.
And ‘Aad, Pharaoh, and the brethren of Lot.
And the dwellers of the woods, and the people of Tubba‘. All of them disbelieved the messengers and, consequently, My retribution befell them.
Were we too burdened by the first creation? Is this why they doubt resurrection?
We created the human, and we know what he whispers to himself. We are closer to him than his jugular vein.
YENİSİ: Biz insanı yarattık ve onun kendi kendine ne fısıldadığını biliriz. Biz ona şah damarından daha yakınız.

value: Two recording (angels), at right and at left, are constantly recording.
YENİSİ: Sağında ve solunda bulunan iki kaydedici (melek) sürekli kaydediyorlar.

value: ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦\nSura 50: Q (Qãf)\nIn the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
YENİSİ: ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦\nSure 50: Q (Kâf)\nEn Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: *50:1 See Appendix 1 for the awesome miracles connected with the Initial “Q.”
Not an utterance does he utter without an alert witness.
Finally, the inevitable coma of death comes; this is what you tried to evade.
The horn is blown; this is the promised day.
YENİSİ: Sur üflenir; işte bu, söz verilen gündür.

value: Every soul comes with a herder and a witness.
You used to be oblivious to this. We now remove your veil; today, your vision is (as strong as) steel.
YENİSİ: Vaktiyle sen buna karşı gafletteydin. Artık senin perdeni kaldırıyoruz; bugün senin görüşün çelik (kadar güçlüdür).

value: The companion said, “Here is my formidable testimony.*”
Throw into Gehenna every stubborn disbeliever.
Forbidder of charity, aggressor, full of doubt.
YENİSİ: Hayra engel olan, saldırgan, şüphe dolu olan.

value: He set up beside GOD another god. Throw him into severe retribution.
His companion said, “Our Lord, I did not mislead him; he was far astray.”
He said, “Do not feud in front of Me; I have sufficiently warned you.
“Nothing can be changed now. I am never unjust towards the people.”
That is the day when we ask Hell, “Have you had enough?” It will say, “Give me more.”
Paradise will be offered to the righteous, readily.
This is what was promised to every repenter, steadfast.
They reverenced the Most Gracious, in their privacy, and came wholeheartedly.
Enter it in peace; this is the Day of Eternity.
They get anything they wish therein, and we have even more.
Many a generation before them, who were more powerful, we annihilated. They searched the land; did they find an escape?
YENİSİ: Onlardan önceki daha güçlü olan birçok nesli imha ettik. Ülkeyi araştırdılar; bir kaçış yolu buldular mı?

value: This should be a lesson for everyone who possesses a mind, or is able to hear and witness.
We have created the heavens and the earth, and everything between them in six days, and no fatigue touched us.
Therefore, be patient in the face of their utterances, and praise and glorify your Lord before sunrise, and before sunset.
During the night you shall meditate on His name, and after prostrating.
Prepare for the day when the caller calls from a place that is near.
When they hear the inevitable cry; that is the day you come out.
We are the ones who control life and death; to us is the final destiny.
The day will come when the earth cracks in a hurry, giving rise to them. Such summoning is easy for us to do.
We are fully aware of everything they utter, while you have no power over them. Therefore, remind with this Quran, those who reverence My warnings.
YENİSİ: Onlar üzerinde hiçbir gücün olmamasına rağmen biz onların söylediği her şeyin tamamen farkındayız. Bu nedenle, Benim uyarılarıma derin saygı duyanlara bu Kuran ile hatırlat.

value: *50:23-28 Your life-time companion witnesses everything you do. See Appendix 7.
Drivers of the Winds (Al-Dhãreyãt) 51:1-39
YENİSİ: Rüzgârları Sürükleyenler (El-Zariyat) 51:1-39

value: The blowing winds.
Bearing rain.
Bringing provisions.
Distributing them as commanded.
What is promised to you will surely come to pass.
The Day of Judgment is inevitable.
Despite the perfectly created sky.
You continue to dispute the truth.
YENİSİ: Siz hakikate itiraz etmeye devam ediyorsunuz.

value: Deviating therefrom are the deviators.
YENİSİ: Ondan sapmakta olanlar asıl sapanlardır.

value: Woe to the falsifiers.
YENİSİ: Yazıklar olsun sahtekârlara.

value: In their blundering, they are totally heedless.
YENİSİ: Bocalayan hâllerinde, onlar tümüyle aymazdırlar.

value: They question the Day of Judgment.
The day they are presented to the fire.
Taste the retribution; this is what you used to challenge.
The righteous have deserved gardens and springs.
They receive their Lord’s rewards, for they used to be pious.
YENİSİ: Onlar Rablerinin ödüllerini alırlar, çünkü onlar takva sahibi olanlardı.

value: Rarely did they sleep the whole night.
At dawn, they prayed for forgiveness.
A portion of their money was set aside for the beggar and the needy.
YENİSİ: Paralarının bir kısmı dilenciler ve muhtaçlar için ayrılırdı.

value: The earth is full of signs for those who are certain.
YENİSİ: Yeryüzü, kesinliğe erişenler için işaretlerle doludur.

value: And within yourselves; can you see?
YENİSİ: Kendinizde de görebiliyor musunuz?

value: In the heaven is your provision, and everything that is promised to you.
By the Lord of the heaven and the earth, this is as true as the fact that you speak.
Have you noted the history of Abraham’s honorable guests?
YENİSİ: İbrahim’in şerefli misafirlerinin tarihine dikkat ettin mi?

value: They visited him, saying, “Peace.” He said, “Peace to you, strangers!”
He asked his family to prepare a fat calf.
When he offered it to them, he remarked, “Do you not eat?”
He harbored fear of them. They said, “Have no fear,” and they gave good news of a knowledgeable son.
His wife was astonished. Noting her wrinkled face: “I am a sterile old woman.”
They said, “Thus said your Lord. He is the Most Wise, the Omniscient.”
He said, “What are you up to, O messengers?”
They said, “We have been dispatched to criminal people.
“We will shower them with rocks of clay.
“Marked by your Lord for the transgressors.”
We then delivered all the believers.
We did not find in it except one house of submitters.
We set it up as a lesson for those who fear the painful retribution.
In Moses (there is a lesson). We sent him to Pharaoh with manifest proofs.
YENİSİ: Musa’da (bir ders vardır). Onu Firavun’a apaçık işaretlerle gönderdik.

value: But he turned away, in arrogance, and said, “Magician, or crazy.”

YENİSİ: Rüzgârları Sürükleyenler (El-Zariyat) 51:40-60 & Sina Dağı (El-Tur) 52:1-10

value: Consequently, we punished him and his troops. We threw them into the sea, and he is the one to blame.
In ‘Aad (there is a lesson). We sent upon them disastrous wind.
Anything that it came upon was utterly destroyed.
In Thamoud (there is a lesson). They were told, “Enjoy temporarily.”
They rebelled against the command of their Lord. Consequently, the lightning struck them as they looked.
They could never get up, nor were they helped.
And the people of Noah before that; they were wicked people.
We constructed the sky with our hands, and we will continue to expand it.
And we made the earth habitable; a perfect design.
YENİSİ: Ve biz yeryüzünü yaşanabilir kıldık; mükemmel bir tasarım.

value: We created a pair (male and female) of everything, that you may take heed.
You shall escape to GOD. I am sent by Him to you as a manifest warner.
YENİSİ: TANRI’ya kaçıp sığının. Ben O’nun tarafından size apaçık bir uyarıcı olarak gönderildim.

value: Do not set up beside GOD any other god. I am sent by Him to you as a manifest warner.
YENİSİ: TANRI’nın yanında başka herhangi bir tanrı edinmeyin. Ben O’nun tarafından size apaçık bir uyarıcı olarak gönderildim.

value: Consistently, when a messenger went to the previous generations, they said, “Magician,” or, “Crazy.”
Did they make an agreement with each other? Indeed, they are transgressors.
You may disregard them; you cannot be blamed.
YENİSİ: Onları görmezden gelebilirsin; sen suçlanamazsın.

value: And remind, for the reminder benefits the believers.
YENİSİ: Ve hatırlat, zira hatırlatma inananlara fayda sağlar.

value: I did not create the jinns and the humans except to worship Me alone.
I need no provisions from them, nor do I need them to feed Me.
GOD is the Provider, the Possessor of all power, the Supreme.
YENİSİ: Rızık Sağlayıcı TANRI’dır, tüm gücün Sahibidir, En Üstün Olandır.

value: The transgressors have incurred the same fate as their previous counterparts; they should not challenge.
Woe to those who disbelieved from the day that is awaiting them.
“Expansion of the Universe Theory”\nConfirmed
The Purpose of Our Existence
Mt. Sinai.
The recorded scripture.
Published in books.
The frequented Shrine.
The exalted ceiling.
The sea that is set aflame.
Your Lord’s requital is unavoidable.
YENİSİ: Rabbinin misillemesi kaçınılmazdır.

value: No force in the universe can stop it.
The day will come when the sky will violently thunder.
The mountains will be wiped out.
YENİSİ: Dağlar ortadan kaldırılmış olacak.

value: Mt. Sinai (Al-Toor) 52:11-41
YENİSİ: Sina Dağı (El-Tur) 52:11-41

value: Woe on that day to the disbelievers—
YENİSİ: Yazıklar olsun o gün inkârcılara—

value: who are in their blundering, heedless.
YENİSİ: ki onlar bocalayan hâllerinde aymazdırlar.

value: They will be herded into Gehenna, forcibly.
This is the Fire in which you used to disbelieve.
Is this magic, or do you not see?
Suffer the burning. Whether you are patient or impatient, it will be the same for you. This is the just requital for what you did.
YENİSİ: Yanmanın ızdırabını çekin. İster sabırlı olun ister sabırsız, sizin için aynı olacaktır. İşte  yaptıklarınızın adil karşılığı budur.

value: The righteous have deserved gardens and bliss.
They enjoy what their Lord has reserved for them; their Lord has spared them the retribution of Hell.
Eat and drink happily, in return for your works.
They relax on luxurious furnishings, and we match them with beautiful spouses.
For those who believed, and their children also followed them in belief, we will have their children join them. We never fail to reward them for any work. Every person is paid for what he did.
YENİSİ: İnanmış olanlara ve onları inançta takip etmiş evlatlarına gelince, evlatlarının onlara katılmasını sağlarız. Biz herhangi bir iş için onları asla ödülsüz bırakmayız. Her kişiye yaptığının karşılığı ödenir.

value: We will supply them with fruits and meats that they love.
They will enjoy drinks that are never polluted, and never sinful to drink.
Serving them will be servants like protected pearls.
They will meet each other and reminisce among themselves.
They will say, “We used to be kind and humble among our people.
YENİSİ: Diyecekler ki: “Biz vaktiyle halkımız arasında nazik ve alçakgönüllüydük.

value: “GOD has blessed us, and has spared us the agony of ill winds.
YENİSİ: “TANRI bizi nimetlendirdi ve bizi kötü rüzgârların ızdırabından esirgedi.

value: “We used to implore Him; He is the Most Kind, Most Merciful.”
YENİSİ: “Biz vaktiyle O’na yalvarırdık; O, En Nazik Olandır, En Merhametli Olandır.”

value: You shall remind the people. With your Lord’s blessing’s upon you, you are neither a soothsayer, nor crazy.
They may say, “He is a poet; let us just wait until he is dead.”
Say, “Go on waiting; I will wait along with you.”
Is it their dreams that dictate their behavior, or are they naturally wicked?
Do they say, “He made it all up?” Instead, they are simply disbelievers.
Let them produce a Hadith like this, if they are truthful.
YENİSİ: Bunun gibi bir Hadis ortaya koysunlar, eğer doğru sözlü iseler.

value: Were they created from nothing? Are they the creators?
Did they create the heavens and the earth? Indeed, they have no certainty.
Do they possess the treasures of your Lord? Are they in control?
Do they climb a ladder that enables them to listen? Let their listeners show their proof.
Does He have daughters, while you have sons?
Are you asking them for any wage, and they are burdened thereby?
Do they know the future, and have it recorded?
The Messenger
“Mohammedans” Challenge God and Produce Hadith
Mt. Sinai (Al-Toor) 52:42-49 & The Stars (Al-Najm) 53:1-23
YENİSİ: Sina Dağı (El-Tur) 52:42-49 & Yıldızlar (El-Necm) 53:1-23

value: Are they plotting and scheming? The disbelievers’ schemes backfire against them.
YENİSİ: Onlar düzen ve plan mı kuruyorlar? İnkârcıların planları kendilerine karşı geri teper.

value: Do they have another god besides GOD? GOD be glorified, far above having partners.
YENİSİ: Onların TANRI’nın dışında başka bir tanrısı mı var? Ortaklara sahip olmanın çok üstünde olan TANRI yüceltilsin.

value: When they see masses falling from the sky, they will say, “Piled clouds!”
Disregard them until they meet the day in which they are struck.
YENİSİ: Onlar vurulacakları güne kavuşuncaya dek onları görmezden gel.

value: On that day, their schemes will not protect them, nor will they be helped.
YENİSİ: O gün, planları onları korumayacaktır, onlara yardım da edilmeyecektir.

value: Those who transgress suffer retribution here, but most of them do not know.
You shall steadfastly persevere in carrying out your Lord’s command—you are in our eyes—and glorify and praise your Lord when you get up.
Also during the night glorify Him, and at dawn as the stars fade away.
As the stars fell away.*
YENİSİ: Yıldızlar düşerek uzaklaşırken.*

value: Your friend (Muhammad) was not astray, nor was he deceived.
YENİSİ: Arkadaşınız (Muhammed) ne saptı ne de aldatıldı.

value: Nor was he speaking out of a personal desire.
YENİSİ: Ne de kişisel bir arzuyla konuşuyordu.

value: It was divine inspiration.
YENİSİ: Göksel ilhamdı o.

value: Dictated by the Most Powerful.
YENİSİ: En Güçlü Olan tarafından dikte edilen.

value: Possessor of all authority. From His highest height.
YENİSİ: Tüm otoritenin Sahibi. O’nun en yüksek makamından.

value: At the highest horizon.
YENİSİ: En yüksek ufuktaki.

value: He drew nearer by moving down.
YENİSİ: Aşağı inerek O yaklaştı.

value: Until He became as close as possible.
YENİSİ: Mümkün olduğunca yakın hâle gelene dek.

value: He then revealed to His servant what was to be revealed.
YENİSİ: Sonra kuluna vahyedilmesi gerekeni O vahyetti.

value: The mind never made up what it saw.
YENİSİ: Zihin gördüğü şeyi asla uydurmuş değil.

value: Are you doubting what he saw?
YENİSİ: Gördüğü şeyden mi şüphe ediyorsunuz?

value: He saw him in another descent.
YENİSİ: Başka bir inişte de onu gördü.

value: At the ultimate point.
YENİSİ: En nihai noktada.

value: Where the eternal Paradise is located.
YENİSİ: Ebedi Cennetin konumlandığı yerde.

value: The whole place was overwhelmed.
YENİSİ: Tüm mekân kuşatılmıştı.

value: The eyes did not waver, nor go blind.
YENİSİ: Gözler kaymadı, kör de olmadı.

value: He saw great signs of his Lord.
YENİSİ: Rabbinin büyük işaretlerini gördü.

value: Compare this with the female idols Allaat and Al-‘Uzzah.
YENİSİ: Bunu dişi putlar Lat ve Uzza ile kıyaslayın.

value: And Manaat, the third one.
YENİSİ: Ve üçüncüsü Menat ile.

value: Do you have sons, while He has these as daughters?
YENİSİ: Sizin oğullarınız varken, O’nun da kızları olarak bunlar mı var?

value: What a disgraceful distribution!
YENİSİ: Ne rezalet bir dağıtım!

value: These are but names that you made up, you and your forefathers. GOD never authorized such a blasphemy. They follow conjecture, and personal desire, when the true guidance has come to them herein from their Lord.
YENİSİ: Bunlar sizin ve atalarınızın uydurmuş olduğu isimlerden başka bir şey değil. TANRI hiçbir zaman böyle bir küfrü yetkilendirmedi. Kendilerine Rablerinden bunun içinde hakiki rehberlik geldiğinde, zannı ve kişisel arzuyu takip ederler.

value: *53:1-18 Muhammad was summoned to the highest universe to receive this Quran into his heart. The stars fell away as he traveled through them at millions of times the speed of light. Subsequently, the Quran was gradually released to his memory. Please see Appendix 28.
YENİSİ: *53:1-18 Muhammed, bu Kuran’ı kalbine almak için en yüksek evrene çağrıldı. Işık hızının milyonlarca katı hızla yıldızların içinden geçerken, yıldızlar düşerek uzaklaşıyordu. Ardından, Kuran hafızasına kademeli olarak bırakıldı. Lütfen Ek 28’e bakınız.

value: What is it that the human being desires?

value: Not even the angels in heaven possess authority to intercede. The only ones permitted by GOD are those who act in accordance with His will and His approval.
YENİSİ: Gökteki melekler bile şefaat etme yetkisine sahip değiller. TANRI'nın izin verdiği kimseler ancak, O’nun iradesine ve onayına uygun olarak hareket edenlerdir.

value: They had no knowledge about this; they only conjectured. Conjecture is no substitute for the truth.

value: You shall disregard those who turn away from our message, and become preoccupied with this worldly life.

value: This is the extent of their knowledge. Your Lord is fully aware of those who strayed away from His path, and He is fully aware of those who are guided.

value: To GOD belongs everything in the heavens and everything on earth. He will requite those who commit evil for their works, and will reward the righteous for their righteousness.

value: They avoid gross sins and transgressions, except for minor offenses. Your Lord’s forgiveness is immense. value: The Ark

*54:1 This important sign of the approaching end of the world came to pass in 1969 when humans landed on the moon and brought pieces of the moon to earth. At the same time, God’s mathematical Miracle of the Quran was being gradually unveiled. Traditional Muslims opposed it, since it exposed the fallacy of their practices (Appendix 25).
YENİSİ: *54:1 Dünyanın yaklaşan sonunun bu önemli işareti, insanların aya iniş yaptığı ve yeryüzüne aya ait parçalar getirdiği 1969’da gerçekleşti. Aynı zamanda, Tanrı’nın matematiksel Kuran Mucizesi kademeli olarak ortaya çıkarılıyordu. Geleneksel Müslümanlar, onların uygulamalarının yanlışlığını ifşa ettiği için ona karşı çıktılar (Ek 25).

value: *56:13-40 People who believe and nourish their souls through worshiping God alone are destined for the High Heaven. The contemporary followers of each messenger invariably suffer persecution from the traditionalists and adherents of the corrupted religion. Thus, they have a special place reserved for them in the High Heaven. All people who die before the age of 40 go to the Lower Heaven, at least (46:15).
YENİSİ: *56:13-40 Yalnızca Tanrı’ya tapınma yoluyla nefislerini besleyen inananlar Üst Cennet için mukadderdirler. Her elçinin çağdaş takipçileri, değişmez biçimde gelenekçilerden ve bozulmuş dine mensup olanlardan zulme uğrar. Böylece, Üst Cennette kendileri için ayrılmış özel bir yer vardır. 40 yaşından önce ölen tüm insanlar, en azından Alt Cennete giderler (46:15).

Glorifying GOD is everything in the heavens and the earth. He is the Almighty, Most Wise.
YENİSİ: Göklerdeki ve yeryüzündeki her şey TANRI’yı yüceltmektedir. O Kudretlidir, En Bilge Olandır.

value: To Him belongs the kingship of the heavens and the earth. He controls life and death. He is Omnipotent.
YENİSİ: Göklerin ve yeryüzünün krallığı O’na aittir. O, hayatı ve ölümü kontrol eder. O, Her Şeye Gücü Yetendir.

value: He is the Alpha and the Omega. He is the Outermost and the Innermost. He is fully aware of all things.
YENİSİ: O, Alfa ve Omegadır. O, En Dıştaki ve En İçtekidir. O, her şeyin tamamen farkındadır.

value:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sura 57: Iron
(Al-Hadeed)
In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
YENİSİ:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sure 57: Demir
(El-Hadid)
En Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: *56:75-76 Our universe, the smallest and innermost of seven universes, contains a billion galaxies, a billion trillion stars, spanning billions of light years. These uncountable decillions of heavenly bodies maintain their orbits in a divinely controlled precision. The more we learn, the more we realize how awesome this oath is. See Appendix 6.

*56:79 The insincere who are not satisfied with the Quran alone are divinely prevented from understanding the Quran. This concept is repeated throughout the Quran (17:45, 18:57). Consequently, they cannot understand this verse. For example, compare this translation of 7:3, 17:46, 41:44, & 56:79 with other translations.
Iron (Al-Hadeed) 57:4-15
YENİSİ: Demir (El-Hadid) 57:4-15

value: He is the One who created the heavens and the earth in six days,* then assumed all authority. He knows everything that enters into the earth, and everything that comes out of it, and everything that comes down from the sky, and everything that climbs into it. He is with you wherever you may be. GOD is Seer of everything you do.
To Him belongs the kingship of the heavens and the earth. All matters are controlled by GOD.
YENİSİ: Göklerin ve yeryüzünün krallığı O’na aittir. Bütün meseleler TANRI tarafından kontrol edilir.

value: He merges the night into the day, and merges the day into the night. He is fully aware of the innermost thoughts.
Believe in GOD and His messenger, and give from what He has bestowed upon you. Those among you who believe and give (to charity) have deserved a great recompense.
Why should you not believe in GOD when the messenger is inviting you to believe in your Lord? He has taken a pledge from you, if you are believers.
He is the One who sends down to His servant clear revelations, in order to lead you out of the darkness into the light. GOD is Compassionate towards you, Most Merciful.

Why do you not spend in the cause of GOD, when GOD possesses all wealth in the heavens and the earth?

Special Honor
Distinguished from the rest are those among you who spend before the victory and strive. They attain a greater rank than those who spend after the victory and strive. For each, GOD promises salvation. GOD is Cognizant of everything you do.
Who would like to loan GOD a loan of righteousness, to have it multiplied for him manifold, and end up with a generous recompense?

The day will come when you see the believing men and women with their lights radiating ahead of them and to their right. Good news is yours that, on that day, you will have gardens with flowing streams. You will abide therein forever. This is the great triumph.

On that day, the hypocrite men and women will say to those who believed, “Please allow us to absorb some of your light.” It will be said, “Go back behind you, and seek light.” A barrier will be set up between them, whose gate separates mercy on the inner side, from retribution on the outer side.
YENİSİ: O gün, ikiyüzlü erkekler ve ikiyüzlü kadınlar inanmış olanlara diyecekler ki: “Lütfen ışığınızın bir kısmını almamıza izin verin.” Onlara, “Arkanıza geri dönün ve ışık arayın” denilecek. Aralarına kapısı iç taraftaki merhameti, dış taraftaki azaptan ayıran bir bariyer kurulacaktır.

value: They will call upon them, “Were we not with you?” They will answer, “Yes, but you cheated your souls, hesitated, doubted, and became misled by wishful thinking, until GOD’s judgment came. You were diverted from GOD by illusions.
YENİSİ: “Biz sizlerle değil miydik?” diye onlara seslenecekler. Onlar da şöyle cevaplayacaklar, “Evet ama siz nefislerinizi aldattınız, çekindiniz, şüphelendiniz ve TANRI’nın yargısı gelinceye kadar kuruntular tarafından kandırıldınız. Siz illüzyonlar tarafından TANRI’dan başka yöne çevrildiniz.

value: “Therefore, today no ransom can be taken from you, nor from those who disbelieved. Your abode is the fire; it is your lord, and miserable abode.
YENİSİ: “Bu nedenle, bugün ne sizden ne de inkâr etmiş olanlardan hiçbir fidye alınamaz. Meskeniniz ateştir; sizin rabbiniz ve sefil meskeniniz odur.”

value: The Great Triumph
YENİSİ: Büyük Zafer

value: The Worst Losers
YENİSİ: En Beter Kaybedenler

value: *57:4 The six days of creation are simply a yardstick to inform us of the relative importance of various components, to emphasize the significance of the planet Earth, and to let us know that the Earth is the only inhabited planet. See Footnote 41:9-10.
Iron (Al-Hadeed) 57:16-25
YENİSİ: Demir (El-Hadid) 57:16-25

value: Is it not time for those who believed to open up their hearts for GOD’s message, and the truth that is revealed herein? They should not be like the followers of previous scriptures whose hearts became hardened with time and, consequently, many of them turned wicked.
YENİSİ: İnanmış olanların TANRI’nın mesajına ve burada vahyedilen hakikate kalplerini açmalarının zamanı gelmedi mi? Onlar, önceki kutsal yazıların takipçileri gibi olmamalıdırlar, ki zamanla kalpleri katılaştı ve sonuç olarak çoğu kötü kimselere dönüştüler.

value: Know that GOD revives the land after it had died. We thus explain the revelations for you, that you may understand.
Surely, the charitable men and women, have loaned GOD a loan of goodness. They will receive their reward multiplied manifold; they have deserved a generous recompense.

Those who believed in GOD and His messengers are the saints and martyrs. Reserved for them at their Lord are their rewards and their light. As for those who disbelieved and rejected our revelations, they have incurred Hell.

Know that this worldly life is no more than play and games, and boasting among you, and hoarding of money and children. It is like abundant rain that produces plants and pleases the disbelievers. But then the plants turn into useless hay, and are blown away by the wind. In the Hereafter there is either severe retribution, or forgiveness from GOD and approval. This worldly life is no more than a temporary illusion.
YENİSİ: Bilin ki bu dünyevi hayat, oyun ve eğlenceden, aranızda övünmeden, para ve evlat biriktirmekten fazlası değildir. Bu, bitkileri yetiştiren ve inkârcıları memnun eden bol yağmur gibidir. Fakat sonra bitkiler işe yaramaz kuru ota dönüşür ve rüzgârla savrulur. Ahirette ya şiddetli bir azap ya da TANRI’dan bağışlanma ve onay vardır. Bu dünyevi hayat geçici bir illüzyondan fazlası değildir.

value: Therefore, you shall race towards forgiveness from your Lord, and a Paradise whose width encompasses the heaven and the earth. It awaits those who believed in GOD and His messengers. Such is GOD’s grace that He bestows upon whomever He wills. GOD is Possessor of Infinite Grace.
Anything that happens on earth, or to you, has already been recorded, even before the creation. This is easy for GOD to do.
Thus, you should not grieve over anything you miss, nor be proud of anything He has bestowed upon you. GOD does not love those who are boastful, proud.
They are stingy, and enjoin the people to be stingy. If one turns away, then GOD is the Rich, the Praiseworthy.

We sent our messengers supported by clear proofs, and we sent down to them the scripture and the law, that the people may uphold justice. And we sent down the iron, wherein there is strength, and many benefits for the people. All this in order for GOD to distinguish those who would support Him and His messengers, on faith. GOD is Powerful, Almighty.
YENİSİ: Biz apaçık kanıtlarla desteklenen elçilerimizi gönderdik ve onlara kutsal yazı ve yasayı indirdik ki, insanlar adaleti ayakta tutabilsinler. Demiri de biz indirdik; onun içinde güç ve insanlar için birçok fayda vardır. Bütün bunlar, kimlerin O’nu ve elçilerini imanla destekleyeceğini TANRI’nın ayırt etmesi içindir. TANRI Güçlüdür, Kudretlidir.

value: Deterioration of Religion
YENİSİ: Dinin Gerileyerek Bozulması

value: Preoccupation With\nThis Life Condemned
YENİSİ: Zihnin Bu Hayatla\nMeşgul Olması Kınandı

value: The Intelligent Alternative
YENİSİ: Akıllıca Seçenek

value: Profound Fact*
YENİSİ: Esaslı Gerçek*

value: Iron: The Most Useful Metal
YENİSİ: Demir: En Yararlı Metal

value: *57:22 We are absolutely free to side with God, or with Satan. God happens to know precisely what kind of decision each of us will make. The video tape of your life, from birth to death, is already recorded. See Appendix 14.
YENİSİ: *57:22 Bizler Tanrı’nın veya Şeytan’ın tarafında olmakta tamamen özgürüz. Tanrı her birimizin ne tür bir karar alacağını tam olarak bilmektedir. Doğumdan ölüme kadar hayatınızın video kaydı zaten kaydedilmiştir. Ek 14’e bakınız

value: Iron (Al-Hadeed) 57:26-29 & The Debate (Al-Mujaadalah) 58:1-6
YENİSİ: Demir (El-Hadid) 57:26-29 & Tartışma (El-Mücadele) 58:1-6

value: We sent Noah and Abraham, and we granted their descendants prophethood and the scripture. Some of them were guided, while many were wicked.

Subsequent to them, we sent our messengers. We sent Jesus the son of Mary, and we gave him the Injeel (Gospel), and we placed in the hearts of his followers kindness and mercy. But they invented hermitism which we never decreed for them. All we asked them to do was to uphold the commandments approved by GOD. But they did not uphold the message as they should have. Consequently, we gave those who believed among them their recompense, while many of them were wicked.
YENİSİ: Onların ardından elçilerimizi gönderdik. Meryem oğlu İsa’yı gönderdik, ona İncil’i (Gospel) verdik ve onun takipçilerinin kalplerine şefkat ve merhamet yerleştirdik. Fakat onlar için asla hükme bağlamadığımız bir ruhbanlık icat ettiler. Onlardan tüm istediğimiz, TANRI’nın onayladığı buyruklara bağlı kalmalarıydı. Fakat mesaja gereği gibi bağlı kalmadılar. Sonuç olarak, aralarından inananlara mükâfatlarını verdik, oysa çoğu kötüydü.

value: O you who believe, you shall reverence GOD and believe in His messenger. He will then grant you double the reward from His mercy, endow you with light to guide you, and forgive you. GOD is Forgiver, Most Merciful.

Thus, the followers of previous scripture should know that they have not monopolized GOD’s mercy and grace, and that all grace is in GOD’s hand. He bestows it upon whomever He wills. GOD is Possessor of Infinite Grace.
YENİSİ: Bu nedenle, önceki kutsal yazıların takipçileri, TANRI’nın merhametini ve lütfunu tekelleştirmemiş olduklarını ve lütfun tümünün TANRI’nın elinde olduğunu bilmelidirler. O, onu dilediğine ihsan eder. TANRI Sonsuz Lütuf Sahibidir.

value: The Prophets
YENİSİ: Peygamberler

value: Deterioration of Religion
YENİSİ: Dinin Gerileyerek Bozulması

value: GOD has heard the woman who debated with you about her husband, and complained to GOD. GOD heard everything the two of you discussed. GOD is Hearer, Seer.

Those among you who estrange their wives (by declaring them as forbidden in sex) as their mothers know full well that they are not their mothers.* Their mothers are the women who gave birth to them. Indeed, they are committing a blasphemy and a falsehood. GOD is Pardoner, Forgiver.
YENİSİ: Aranızdan, eşlerini (cinsel ilişkide haram olduklarını beyan ederek) anneleriymiş gibi yabancılaştıranlar gayet iyi bilirler ki, onlar kendilerinin anneleri değildirler.* Anneleri, kendilerini doğuran kadınlardır. Doğrusu, onlar bir küfür ve yalan işliyorlar. TANRI Affedicidir, Bağışlayıcıdır.

value: Those who estrange their wives in this manner, then reconcile thereafter, shall atone by freeing a slave before resuming their sexual relations. This is to enlighten you. GOD is Cognizant of everything you do.

If you cannot find a slave to free, you shall fast two consecutive months before resuming sexual relations. If you cannot fast, then you shall feed sixty poor people. You shall believe in GOD and His messenger. These are GOD’s laws. The disbelievers have incurred a painful retribution.

Surely, those who fight GOD and His messenger are committed to defeat, like their previous counterparts were committed to defeat. We have sent down clear proofs, and the rejectors have incurred a shameful retribution.
The day will come when GOD will resurrect them all, then inform them of everything they had done. GOD has recorded everything, while they have forgotten it. GOD witnesses all things.

♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sura 58: The Debate
(Al-Mujaadalah)
In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
YENİSİ:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sure 58: Tartışma
(El-Mücadele)
En Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: *58:2 Estranging a wife by declaring that she is like one’s mother was an ancient tradition in Arabia. This is the only sura where the word “Allah” occurs in every verse.
YENİSİ: *58:2 Bir eşin, birinin annesi gibi olduğunu beyan ederek yabancılaştırılması Arabistan’da kadim bir gelenekti. Bu, “Allah” kelimesinin her ayette geçtiği tek suredir.

value: The Debate (Al-Mujaadalah) 58:7-18
YENİSİ: Tartışma (El-Mücadele) 58:7-18

value: Do you not realize that GOD knows everything in the heavens and everything on earth? No three people can conspire secretly without Him being their fourth, nor five without Him being the sixth, nor less than that, nor more, without Him being there with them wherever they may be. Then, on the Day of Resurrection, He will inform them of everything they had done. GOD is fully aware of all things.
YENİSİ: TANRI’nın göklerdeki her şeyi ve yeryüzündeki her şeyi bildiğinin farkında değil misiniz? Gizlice komplo kuran üç kişi yoktur ki, dördüncüleri O olmasın yahut beş kişi yoktur ki, altıncıları O olmasın, ne bundan daha az ne de daha çok, nerede olurlarsa olsunlar O kendileriyle beraberdir. Sonra O, Diriliş Günü’nde, yapmış oldukları her şeyi onlara haber verecektir. TANRI her şeyin tamamen farkındadır.

value: Have you noted those who were enjoined from conspiring secretly, then insist on conspiring? They conspire to commit sin, transgression, and disobedience of the messenger. When they come to you, they greet you with a greeting other than that decreed by GOD. They say inside themselves, “GOD will not punish us for our utterances.” Their only requital is Gehenna, wherein they burn; what a miserable destiny.
YENİSİ: Gizlice komplo kurmaktan men edilen, sonra da komplo kurmakta ısrar edenlere dikkat ettin mi? Onlar, günah işlemek, haddi aşmak ve elçiye itaatsizlik etmek için komplo kurarlar. Sana geldiklerinde, seni TANRI tarafından hükme bağlanandan başka bir selamla selamlarlar. İçlerinden, “TANRI söylemlerimiz için bizi cezalandırmayacak” derler. Onların tek karşılığı, içinde yanacakları Cehennemdir; ne sefil bir kader.

value: O you who believe, if you have to confer secretly, you shall not confer to commit sin, transgression, and to disobey the messenger. You shall confer to work righteousness and piety. You shall reverence GOD, before whom you will be summoned.
YENİSİ: Ey inananlar, eğer gizlice görüşmeniz gerekiyorsa, günah işlemek, haddi aşmak ve elçiye itaatsizlik etmek amacıyla görüşme yapmayın. Doğruluğa ve takvaya çalışmak için görüşme yapın. Nezdinde toplatılacağınız TANRI’ya derin saygı duyun.

value: Secret conspiracy is the devil’s idea, through which he seeks to hurt those who believed. However, he cannot hurt them against GOD’s will. In GOD the believers shall trust.
YENİSİ: Gizli komplo şeytanın fikridir, o bu yolla inanan kimselere zarar vermeyi amaçlar. Oysaki, TANRI irade etmedikçe o onlara zarar veremez. İnananlar TANRI’ya güvensin.

value: O you who believe, if you are told, “Please make room,” you shall make room for each other to sit. GOD will then make room for you. If you are asked to get up and move, get up and move. GOD raises those among you who believe, and those who acquire knowledge to higher ranks. GOD is fully Cognizant of everything you do.

O you who believe, when you wish to confer with the messenger, you shall offer a charity (to the poor) before you do so. This is better for you, and purer. If you cannot afford it, then GOD is Forgiver, Most Merciful.
YENİSİ: Ey inananlar, elçi ile görüşmek istediğinizde, bunu yapmadan önce (fakirlere) bir bağışta bulunun. Bu sizin için daha iyi ve daha saftır. Eğer buna güç yetiremezseniz, o zaman TANRI Bağışlayıcıdır, En Merhametli Olandır.

value: If you failed to give to charity before conferring, then repented thereafter, GOD accepts your repentance. You shall observe the contact prayers (Salat), give the obligatory charity (Zakat), and obey GOD and His messenger. GOD is fully Cognizant of everything you do.
Have you noted those who befriended people with whom GOD is angry? They neither belong with you, nor with them. They deliberately swear lies!
YENİSİ: TANRI’nın kızgın olduğu insanları dost edinenlere dikkat ettin mi? Onlar ne sizdendir, ne de onlardandır. Onlar bilerek yalan yere yemin ederler!

value: GOD has prepared for them a severe retribution. Miserable indeed is what they used to do.
YENİSİ: TANRI onlar için şiddetli bir azap hazırlamıştır. Vaktiyle yaptıkları şeyler gerçekten de sefil.

value: They used their oaths as a means of repelling from the path of GOD. Consequently, they have incurred a shameful retribution.
YENİSİ: Onlar yeminlerini, TANRI’nın yolundan uzaklaştırmanın bir aracı olarak kullandılar. Sonuç olarak, utanç verici bir azabı üzerlerine çekmişlerdir.

value: Neither their money, nor their children will help them against GOD. They have incurred the hellfire, wherein they abide forever.
YENİSİ: Ne malları, ne de evlatları TANRI’ya karşı onlara yardım etmeyecektir. Onlar Cehennem ateşini üzerlerine çekmişlerdir, içinde sonsuza dek kalırlar.

value: The Day will come when GOD resurrects them all. They will swear to Him then, just as they swear to you now, thinking that they really are right! Indeed, they are the real liars.
YENİSİ: Gün gelecek, TANRI onların hepsini diriltecek. Şu an size nasıl yemin ediyorlarsa, gerçekten doğru olduklarını sanarak o zaman da O’na yemin edecekler! Doğrusu, onlar gerçek yalancılardır.

value: God is With You Now
Do Not Conspire
Choose Your Friends
YENİSİ: Dostlarınızı Seçin

value: The Debate (Al-Mujaadalah) 58:19-22 & Exodus (Al-Hashr) 59:1-7
YENİSİ: Tartışma (El-Mücadele) 58:19-22 & Çıkış (El-Haşr) 59:1-7

value: The devil has possessed them, and has caused them to disregard GOD’s message. These are the party of the devil. Absolutely, the party of the devil are the losers.
YENİSİ: Şeytan onları ele geçirdi ve TANRI’nın mesajını göz ardı etmelerine yol açtı. Bunlar şeytanın tarafıdır. Kesinlikle şeytanın tarafı kaybedenlerdir.

value: Surely, those who oppose GOD and His messenger will be with the lowliest.
GOD has decreed: “I and My messengers will most assuredly win.” GOD is Powerful, Almighty.

You will not find people who believe in GOD and the Last Day befriending those who oppose GOD and His messenger, even if they were their parents, or their children, or their siblings, or their tribe. For these, He decrees faith into their hearts, and supports them with inspiration from Him, and admits them into gardens with flowing streams wherein they abide forever. GOD is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him. These are the party of GOD. Most assuredly, GOD’s party are the winners.
YENİSİ: TANRI’ya ve Son Gün’e inanan insanları, TANRI’ya ve elçisine muhalefet edenlere arkadaşlık ederken bulmayacaksın, hatta onlar kendilerinin ebeveynleri veya evlatları veya kardeşleri veya aşiretleri olsalar bile. Bunlar için, O, kalplerinin içine imanı karara bağlar ve O'ndan gelen ilham ile destekler ve onları içinde sonsuza kadar kalacakları, akan nehirleri olan bahçelere kabul eder. TANRI onlardan hoşnuttur ve onlar da O’ndan hoşnuttur. Bunlar TANRI’nın tarafıdır. Hiç kuşkusuz TANRI’nın tarafı kazananlardır.

value: Run For Your Life
Glorifying GOD is everything in the heavens and the earth, and He is the Almighty, Most Wise.

He is the One who evicted those who disbelieved among the people of the scripture from their homes in a mass exodus. You never thought that they would leave, and they thought that their preparations would protect them from GOD. But then GOD came to them whence they never expected, and threw terror into their hearts. Thus, they abandoned their homes on their own volition, in addition to pressure from the believers. You should learn from this, O you who possess vision.
YENİSİ: Kutsal yazı takipçileri arasındaki inkâr etmiş olanları kitlesel göç ile evlerinden çıkarmış olan O'dur. Onların ayrılacağını hiç düşünmemiştiniz ve onlar da hazırlıklarının onları TANRI’dan koruyacağını sanmışlardı. Fakat sonra, TANRI onlara hiç beklemedikleri bir yerden geldi ve kalplerine dehşet saldı. Böylelikle, evlerini inananların baskısına ek olarak kendi iradeleriyle terk ettiler. Siz bundan ders almalısınız, ey görüş sahipleri.

value: If GOD did not force them to leave, He would have requited them in this life (even worse than forcing them to leave). In the Hereafter He will commit them to the retribution of Hell.
YENİSİ: Eğer TANRI onları terk etmeye zorlamasaydı, onları bu hayatta (terk etmeye zorlamaktan daha da kötüsüyle) karşılığını verirdi. Ahirette ise onları Cehennem azabına teslim edecektir.

value: This is because they opposed GOD and His messenger. For those who oppose GOD and His messenger, GOD is most strict in enforcing retribution.
Whether you chop a tree, or leave it standing on its trunk, is in accordance with GOD’s will. He will surely humiliate the wicked.

Whatever GOD restored for His messenger was not the result of your war efforts, whether you fought on horses or on foot. GOD is the One who sends His messengers against whomever He wills. GOD is Omnipotent.
YENİSİ: TANRI’nın, elçisi için geri verdiği hiçbir şey, ister at üstünde savaşmış olun ister yaya olarak, sizin savaş çabalarınızın sonucu değildir. TANRI’dır irade ettiği kişilerin üzerine elçilerini gönderen. TANRI Her Şeye Gücü Yetendir.

value: Whatever GOD restored to His messenger from the (defeated) communities shall go to GOD and His messenger (in the form of a charity). You shall give it to the relatives, the orphans, the poor, and the traveling alien. Thus, it will not remain monopolized by the strong among you. You may keep the spoils given to you by the messenger, but do not take what he enjoins you from taking. You shall reverence GOD. GOD is strict in enforcing retribution.
YENİSİ: TANRI’nın, (mağlup) topluluklardan elçisine geri verdiği her ne varsa, (bir bağış biçiminde) TANRI’ya ve elçisine verilsin. Onu akrabalara, yetimlere, yoksullara ve yolcu yabancıya verin. Böylece aranızdaki güçlü olanların tekelinde kalmayacaktır. Elçinin size verdiği ganimetleri elinizde tutabilirsiniz, ancak almanızı men ettiği şeyi almayın. TANRI’ya derin saygı duyun. TANRI ceza uygulamada katıdır.

value: God Defends the Believers
The Spoils of War
YENİSİ: Savaş Ganimetleri

value: Exodus (Al-Hashr) 59:8-20
YENİSİ: Çıkış (El-Haşr) 59:8-20

value: (You shall give) to the needy who immigrated. They were evicted from their homes and deprived of their properties, because they sought GOD’s grace and pleasure, and because they supported GOD and His messenger. They are the truthful.
YENİSİ: Göç etmiş olan muhtaçlara (verin). Onlar evlerinden çıkarıldılar ve mallarından mahrum bırakıldılar, çünkü onlar TANRI’nın lütfunu ve hoşnutluğunu aradılar ve çünkü onlar TANRI’yı ve elçisini desteklediler. Onlar doğru sözlü kimselerdir.

value: As for those who provided them with a home and a refuge, and were believers before them, they love those who immigrated to them, and find no hesitation in their hearts in helping them. In fact, they readily give them priority over themselves, even when they themselves need what they give away. Indeed, those who overcome their natural stinginess are the successful ones.

Those who became believers after them say, “Our Lord, forgive us and our brethren who preceded us to the faith, and keep our hearts from harboring any hatred towards those who believed. Our Lord, You are Compassionate, Most Merciful.”
YENİSİ: Onlardan sonra inananlar derler ki: “Rabbimiz, bizi ve imanda bizden önce gelen kardeşlerimizi bağışla ve kalplerimizi inanmış olanlara karşı herhangi bir nefret beslemekten koru. Rabbimiz, Sen Şefkatlisin, En Merhametli Olansın.”

value: Have you noted those who are plagued with hypocrisy, and how they said to their companions in disbelief among the people of the scripture, “If you are evicted we will go out with you, and will never obey anyone who opposes you. If anyone fights you, we will fight on your side.” GOD bears witness that they are liars.
YENİSİ: İkiyüzlülüğe boğulmuş olanlara ve kutsal yazı halkı içindeki inkârcı yoldaşlarına nasıl şöyle söylediklerine dikkat  ettin mi: “Eğer tahliye edilirseniz biz de sizinle çıkacağız ve size muhalefet edenlere asla itaat etmeyeceğiz. Eğer herhangi biri sizinle savaşırsa, sizin safınızda savaşacağız.” TANRI şahitlik eder ki onlar yalancılardır.

value: In fact, if they were evicted, they would not have gone out with them, and if anyone fought them, they would not have supported them. Even if they supported them, they would have turned around and fled. They could never win.
Indeed, you strike more terror in their hearts than their fear of GOD. This is because they are people who do not comprehend.

They do not get together to fight you unless they are in well-shielded buildings, or behind walls. Their might appears formidable among themselves. You would think that they are united, when in fact their hearts are divided. This is because they are people who do not understand.
YENİSİ: Onlar, iyi korunmuş yapılarda veya surların ardında olmadıkça sizinle savaşmak için bir araya gelmezler. Onların gücü, aralarında aşılması zor görünür. Sen onların birlik olduklarını sanarsın, oysa onların kalpleri ayrı kalmıştır. Bunun nedeni onların anlamayan insanlar olmasıdır.

value: Their fate is the same as their counterparts who preceded them. They suffered the consequences of their decisions. They have incurred a painful retribution.
They are like the devil: he says to the human being, “Disbelieve,” then as soon as he disbelieves, he says, “I disown you. I fear GOD, Lord of the universe.”
YENİSİ: Onlar şeytan gibidirler: insanoğluna “İnkâr et” der, ardından o inkâr eder etmez “Ben seni sahiplenmiyorum. Ben kâinatın Rabbi olan TANRI’dan korkarım” der.

value: The destiny for both of them is the Hellfire, wherein they abide forever. This is the requital for the transgressors.
YENİSİ: Her ikisinin de kaderi içinde sonsuza dek kalacakları Cehennem ateşidir. İşte bu haddi aşanların aldığı karşılıktır.

value: O you who believe, you shall reverence GOD, and let every soul examine what it has sent ahead for tomorrow. You shall reverence GOD; GOD is fully Cognizant of everything you do.
YENİSİ: Ey inananlar, TANRI’ya derin saygı duyun ve her nefis yarın için önden göndermiş olduğunu bir gözden geçirsin. TANRI’ya derin saygı duyun; TANRI yaptığınız her şeyden tamamen Haberdardır.

value: Do not be like those who forgot GOD, so He made them forget themselves. These are the wicked.
Not equal are the dwellers of the Hellfire and the dwellers of Paradise; the dwellers of Paradise are the winners.
Exodus (Al-Hashr) 59:21-24 & The Test (Al-Mumtahanah) 60:1-4
YENİSİ: Çıkış (El-Haşr) 59:21-24 & Test (El-Mumtahine) 60:1-4

value: If we revealed this Quran to a mountain, you would see it trembling, crumbling, out of reverence for GOD. We cite these examples for the people, that they may reflect.
YENİSİ: Eğer bu Kuran’ı bir dağa vahyetseydik, TANRI’ya derin saygıdan dolayı, onu titreyerek ufalanıp parçalanırken görürdün. İnsanlar için bu örnekleri veriyoruz ki derinlemesine düşünsünler.

value: He is the One GOD; there is no other god besides Him. Knower of all secrets and declarations. He is the Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
YENİSİ: O, Tek TANRI’dır; O’nun dışında başka bir tanrı yoktur. Bütün sırları ve beyanları Bilen. O, En Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olandır.

value: He is the One GOD; there is no other god besides Him. The King, the Most Sacred, the Peace, the Most Faithful, the Supreme, the Almighty, the Most Powerful, the Most Dignified. GOD be glorified; far above having partners.
YENİSİ: O, Tek TANRI’dır; O’nun dışında başka bir tanrı yoktur. Kral, En Kutsal, Esenlik, En Güvenilir, En Üstün, Kudretli, En Güçlü, En Saygın. TANRI yüceltilsin; ortaklara sahip olmanın çok üstünde.

value: He is the One GOD; the Creator, the Initiator, the Designer. To Him belong the most beautiful names. Glorifying Him is everything in the heavens and the earth. He is the Almighty, Most Wise.
YENİSİ: O, Tek TANRI’dır; Yaratan, Başlatan, Tasarlayan. O’na aittir en güzel isimler. O’nu yüceltmektedir göklerdeki ve yerdeki her şey. O Kudretlidir, En Bilge Olandır.

value: Greatness of the Quran
YENİSİ: Kuran’ın Büyüklüğü

value: God
YENİSİ: Tanrı

value: O you who believe, you shall not befriend My enemies and your enemies, extending love and friendship to them, even though they have disbelieved in the truth that has come to you. They persecute the messenger, and you, just because you believe in GOD, your Lord. If you mobilize to struggle in My cause, seeking My blessings, how can you secretly love them? I am fully aware of everything you conceal, and everything you declare. Those among you who do this have indeed strayed off the right path.
YENİSİ: Ey inananlar, Benim düşmanlarımı ve sizin düşmanlarınızı, size gelmiş olan hakikati inkâr etmiş oldukları hâlde onlara sevgi ve dostluk sunarak dost edinmeyin. Onlar, sırf Rabbiniz olan TANRI’ya inandığınız için elçiye de size de zulmederler. Nimetlerimi arayarak Benim yolumda mücadele etmek için harekete geçiyorsanız, onları nasıl gizlice sevebilirsiniz? Ben gizlediğiniz her şeyin ve beyan ettiğiniz her şeyin tamamen farkındayım. Aranızdan bunu yapanlar gerçekten de doğru yoldan sapmışlardır.

value: Whenever they encounter you, they treat you as enemies, and hurt you with their hands and tongues. They want you to disbelieve.
YENİSİ: Onlar ne zaman sizinle karşılaşsalar size düşman gibi davranırlar ve size elleriyle ve dilleriyle zarar verirler. Sizin inkâr etmenizi isterler.

value: Your relatives and your money can never help you. On the Day of Resurrection, He will judge among you. GOD is Seer of everything you do.

A good example has been set for you by Abraham and those with him. They said to their people, “We disown you and the idols that you worship besides GOD. We denounce you, and you will see nothing from us except animosity and hatred until you believe in GOD ALONE.”* However, a mistake was committed by Abraham when he said to his father, “I will pray for your forgiveness,** but I possess no power to protect you from GOD.” “Our Lord, we trust in You, and submit to You; to You is the final destiny.
YENİSİ: Size, İbrahim ve beraberindekilerde güzel bir örnek verilmiştir. Onlar halklarına dediler ki “Biz sizi ve TANRI’nın dışında, taptığınız o putları sahiplenmiyoruz. Sizi kınıyoruz ve siz YALNIZCA TANRI’ya inanıncaya kadar bizden düşmanlık ve nefret haricinde bir şey görmeyeceksiniz.”* Ancak, babasına “Ben senin bağışlanman için dua edeceğim,** fakat seni TANRI’dan koruyacak hiçbir gücüm yok” dediğinde, İbrahim tarafından bir hata işlenmiş oldu. “Rabbimiz! biz Sana güveniyoruz ve Sana teslim oluyoruz; son varış Sanadır.

value: Abraham: An Example

*60:4 The Arabic word for “ALONE” (WAHDAHU) occurs only six times in the Quran, one of them refers to upholding the Quran ALONE (17:46). The reference to God ALONE occurs in 7:70, 39:45, 40:12 & 40:84, and 60:4. The sum of these numbers (7+70+39+45+40+12+84+60+4) equals 361, or 19x19. This emphasizes that the main theme of the Quran is “Worship God ALONE.” See Appendix 1.
YENİSİ: *60:4 “YALNIZCA” için kullanılan Arapça kelime (VAHDEHU) Kuran’da yalnızca altı kez geçer, bunlardan bir tanesi YALNIZCA Kuran’a bağlı kalmaya işaret eder (17:46). YALNIZCA Tanrı’ya olan referans 7:70, 39:45, 40:12 & 40:84 ve 60:4 ayetlerinde geçmektedir. Bu numaraların toplamı (7+70+39+45+40+12+84+60+4) 361 veya 19x19’a eşittir. Bu da Kuran’ın ana temasının “YALNIZCA Tanrı’ya tapmak” olduğunu vurgulamaktadır. Ek 1’e bakınız.

value: The Test (Al-Mumtahanah) 60:5-13 & The Column (Al-Suff) 61:1
YENİSİ: Test (El-Mumtahine) 60:5-13 & Sütun (El-Saff) 61:1

value: “Our Lord, let us not be oppressed by those who disbelieved, and forgive us. You are the Almighty, Most Wise.”
YENİSİ: “Rabbimiz, inkâr edenler tarafından ezilmemize izin verme ve bizi bağışla. Sen Kudretlisin, En Bilge Olansın.”

value: A good example has been set by them for those who seek GOD and the Last Day. As for those who turn away, GOD is in no need (of them), Most Praiseworthy.
GOD may change the animosity between you and them into love. GOD is Omnipotent. GOD is Forgiver, Most Merciful.

GOD does not enjoin you from befriending those who do not fight you because of religion, and do not evict you from your homes. You may befriend them and be equitable towards them. GOD loves the equitable.
YENİSİ: TANRI, din yüzünden sizinle savaşmayan ve sizi yurtlarınızdan çıkarmayan kimseleri dost edinmenizi yasaklamaz. Onları dost edinebilirsiniz ve onlara karşı adil davranabilirsiniz. TANRI adil olanları sever.

value: GOD enjoins you only from befriending those who fight you because of religion, evict you from your homes, and band together with others to banish you. You shall not befriend them. Those who befriend them are the transgressors.
YENİSİ: TANRI sadece, din yüzünden sizinle savaşanları, sizi yurtlarınızdan çıkaranları ve sizi sürgün etmek için başkalarıyla birleşenleri dost edinmenizi yasaklar. Onları dost edinmeyin. Onları dost edinenler haddi aşanlardır.

value: O you who believe, when believing women (abandon the enemy and) ask for asylum with you, you shall test them. GOD is fully aware of their belief. Once you establish that they are believers, you shall not return them to the disbelievers. They are not lawful to remain married to them, nor shall the disbelievers be allowed to marry them. Give back the dowries that the disbelievers have paid. You commit no error by marrying them, so long as you pay them their due dowries. Do not keep disbelieving wives (if they wish to join the enemy). You may ask them for the dowry you had paid, and they may ask for what they paid. This is GOD’s rule; He rules among you. GOD is Omniscient, Most Wise.
YENİSİ: Ey inananlar, inanan kadınlar (düşman tarafını terk edip) sizden sığınma istediklerinde, onları test edin. TANRI onların inancının tamamen farkındadır. Onların inananlar olduğunu tespit ettiğinizde, onları inkârcılara geri göndermeyin. Onların bu kadınlarla evli kalmaları helal değildir, inkârcıların onlarla evlenmesine de izin verilmesin. İnkârcıların ödemiş oldukları mehirleri geri verin. Kendilerine düşen mehirlerini ödediğiniz sürece onlarla evlenmekle hata etmiş olmazsınız. (Eğer düşmana katılmak isterlerse) inkârcı eşleri nikâhınızda tutmayın. Ödemiş olduğunuz mehri onlardan isteyebilirsiniz, ve onlar da ödemiş olduklarını isteyebilirler. Bu TANRI’nın kuralıdır; O aranızda hükmeder. TANRI Her Şeyi Bilendir, En Bilge Olandır.

value: If any of your wives join the enemies’ camp, and you are forced to fight, you shall force the enemy to compensate the men who lost their wives, by giving them what they spent on their wives. You shall reverence GOD, in whom you believe.

O you prophet, when the believing women (who abandoned the disbelievers) to seek asylum with you pledge to you that they will not set up any idols besides GOD, nor steal, nor commit adultery, nor kill their children, nor fabricate any falsehood, nor disobey your righteous orders, you shall accept their pledge, and pray to GOD to forgive them. GOD is Forgiver, Most Merciful.
YENİSİ: Ey peygamber, (inkârcıları terk etmiş) inanan kadınlar senden sığınma talep edip, TANRI’nın yanı sıra hiçbir put edinmeyeceklerine, hırsızlık yapmayacaklarına, zina etmeyeceklerine, evlatlarını öldürmeyeceklerine, herhangi bir yalan uydurmayacaklarına ve senin doğru olan emirlerine itaatsizlik etmeyeceklerine dair sana taahhütte bulunurlarsa, onların taahhütlerini kabul et ve  onları bağışlaması için TANRI’ya dua et. TANRI Bağışlayıcıdır ve En Merhametli Olandır.

value: O you who believe, do not befriend people with whom GOD is angry, and who are hopelessly stuck in disbelief; they are just as hopeless as the disbelievers who are already in the graves.
YENİSİ: Ey inananlar, TANRI’nın kızgın olduğu ve umutsuzca inkâra saplanmışlar ile arkadaşlık etmeyin; onlar, hâlihazırda kabirlerde olan inkârcılar kadar umutsuzdurlar.

YENİSİ: Sütun (El-Saff) 61:2-14 & Cuma (El-Cum’a) 62:1

value: O you who believe, why do you say what you do not do?
Most abominable in the sight of GOD is that you say what you do not do.
GOD loves those who fight in His cause united in one column, like the bricks in one wall.

Recall that Moses said to his people, “O my people, why do you hurt me, even though you know that I am GOD’s messenger to you?” When they deviated, GOD diverted their hearts. For GOD does not guide the wicked people.

Recall that Jesus, son of Mary, said, “O Children of Israel, I am GOD’s messenger to you, confirming the Torah and bringing good news of a messenger to come after me whose name will be even more praised (Ahmad).” Then, when he showed them the clear proofs, they said, “This is profound magic.”
YENİSİ: Hani Meryem oğlu İsa demişti ki: “Ey İsrailoğulları, ben size TANRI’nın elçisiyim, Tevrat’ı doğruluyorum ve benden sonra gelecek, adının daha da fazla övüleceği bir elçinin (Ahmed) müjdesini getiriyorum.” Sonra onlara apaçık kanıtlar gösterince, “Bu esaslı bir sihir” dediler.

value: Who is more evil than one who fabricates lies about GOD, and he is being invited to Submission? GOD does not guide the evil people.
YENİSİ: Kendisi Teslimiyet’e davet edildiği hâlde, TANRI hakkında yalanlar uydurandan daha kötü kimdir? TANRI kötü insanlara rehberlik etmez.

value: They wish to put out GOD’s light with their mouths. But GOD insists upon perfecting His light, in spite of the disbelievers.
He has sent His messenger* with the guidance and the true religion, and will make it dominate all religions, in spite of the idol worshipers.
YENİSİ: O, elçisini* kılavuz ve hak din ile göndermiştir ve puta tapanlara karşın onu bütün dinlere egemen kılacaktır.

value: O you who believe, let Me inform you of a trade that will save you from painful retribution.
YENİSİ: Ey inananlar, sizi acı veren azaptan kurtaracak bir ticareti size Ben bildireyim.

value: Believe in GOD and His messenger and strive in the cause of GOD with your money and your lives. This is the best deal for you, if you only knew.
YENİSİ: TANRI’ya ve elçisine inanın ve TANRI uğrunda paralarınız ve hayatlarınız ile çaba gösterin. Bu sizin için en iyi alışveriştir, bir bilseydiniz.

value: In return, He forgives your sins, and admits you into gardens with flowing streams, with beautiful mansions in the gardens of Eden. This is the greatest triumph.
YENİSİ: Karşılığında O, günahlarınızı bağışlar, ve sizi akan nehirlerin bulunduğu bahçelere, Aden Bahçelerinde bulunan güzel köşklere kabul eder. İşte bu en büyük zaferdir.

value: Additionally, you get something you truly love: support from GOD and guaranteed victory. Give good news to the believers.
YENİSİ: İlaveten, hakikaten sevdiğiniz bir şey daha elde edersiniz: TANRI’dan destek ve garantilenmiş galibiyet. İnananlara müjde ver.

value: O you who believe, be GOD’s supporters, like the disciples of Jesus, son of Mary. When he said to them, “Who are my supporters towards GOD,” they said, “We are GOD’s supporters.” Thus, a group from the Children of Israel believed, and another group disbelieved. We helped those who believed against their enemy, until they won.

value: He is the One who sent to the gentiles a messenger from among them, to recite to them His revelations, purify them, and teach them the scripture and wisdom. Before this, they had gone far astray.
YENİSİ: O’nun vahiylerini onlara okuması, onları arındırması ve kutsal yazıyı ve bilgeliği onlara öğretmesi için kitap ehli olmayanlara kendi aralarından bir elçi gönderen O’dur. Bundan önce, onlar çok uzak sapmışlardı.

value: And to many generations subsequent to them. He is the Almighty, Most Wise.
YENİSİ: Ve onlardan sonraki nice nesillere. O Kudretlidir, En Bilge Olandır.

value: Such is GOD’s grace that He bestows upon whomever He wills. GOD is Possessor of Infinite Grace.

The example of those who were given the Torah, then failed to uphold it, is like the donkey carrying great works of literature. Miserable indeed is the example of people who rejected GOD’s revelations. GOD does not guide the wicked people.
YENİSİ: Kendilerine Tevrat verilenlerin, sonra da ona bağlı kalmayı başaramayanların örneği, büyük edebi eserler taşıyan eşek gibidir. TANRI’nın vahiylerini reddeden insanların örneği gerçekten de sefildir. TANRI kötü insanlara rehberlik etmez.

value: Say, “O you who are Jewish, if you claim that you are GOD’s chosen, to the exclusion of all other people, then you should long for death if you are truthful!”
They will never long for it, because of what they have committed. GOD is fully aware of the wicked.
YENİSİ: Onlar işlemiş oldukları şeylerden ötürü onu asla arzulamayacaklardır. TANRI kötülerden tamamen farkındadır.

value: Say, “The death that you are trying to evade will catch up with you sooner or later. Then you will be returned to the Knower of all secrets and declarations, then He will inform you of everything you had done.”
YENİSİ: De ki, “Kaçmaya çalıştığınız ölüm er ya da geç sizi yakalayacaktır. Sonra, bütün sırları ve beyanları Bilen’e döndürüleceksiniz, o zaman yapmış olduğunuz her şeyi size bildirecektir.”

value: O you who believe, when the Congregational Prayer (Salat Al-Jumu’ah) is announced on Friday, you shall hasten to the commemoration of GOD, and drop all business. This is better for you, if you only knew.
YENİSİ: Ey inananlar, Cuma günü Cemaatle Dua (Cuma Namazı) duyurulduğunda, TANRI’yı anmak için acele edin ve bütün işleri bırakın. Bu sizin için daha iyidir, bir bilseydiniz.

value: Once the prayer is completed, you may spread through the land to seek GOD’s bounties, and continue to remember GOD frequently, that you may succeed.
YENİSİ: Dua tamamlandıktan sonra TANRI’nın ikramlarını aramak için yeryüzüne dağılabilirsiniz ve TANRI’yı sık sık hatırlamaya devam edin ki başarılı olasınız.

value: When some of them come across a business deal, or some entertainment, they rush to it and leave you standing! Say, “What GOD possesses is far better than the entertainment or the business. GOD is the best Provider.”
YENİSİ: Onlardan bazıları bir ticari anlaşmaya ya da bir eğlenceye denk geldiğinde, ona koştururlar ve seni ayakta bırakırlar! De ki: “TANRI’nın sahip olduğu, eğlenceden ya da ticaretten çok daha iyidir. TANRI en iyi Rızık Sağlayıcıdır.”

value: When the hypocrites come to you they say, “We bear witness that you are the messenger of GOD.”* GOD knows that you are His messenger, and GOD bears witness that the hypocrites are liars.
YENİSİ: İkiyüzlüler sana geldiklerinde, “Şahitlik ederiz ki sen TANRI’nın elçisisin”* derler. TANRI, senin O'nun elçisi olduğunu bilir, ve TANRI şahitlik eder ki ikiyüzlüler yalancıdır.

value: Under the guise of their apparent faith, they repel the people from the path of GOD. Miserable indeed is what they do.
YENİSİ: Görünürdeki itikadlarının kisvesi altında insanları TANRI’nın yolundan uzaklaştırırlar. Yaptıkları şey gerçekten de sefil.

♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sure 63: İkiyüzlüler
(El-Münafikun)
En Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: *63:1 The “first pillar of Islam,” as stated in 3:18 is to bear witness that God is the only god. But the corrupted “Muslim” scholars add “Muhammad is God’s messenger,” and this violates a number of commandments (see 2:285). Verse 63:1 is the only place in the Quran where such a statement is made. Only the hypocrites make such a statement.
The Hypocrites (Al-Munaafeqoon) 63:3-11 & Mutual Blaming (Al-Taghaabun) 64:1-4
YENİSİ: İkiyüzlüler (El-Münafikun) 63:3-11 & Karşılıklı Suçlama (El-Teğabun) 64:1-4

value: This is because they believed, then disbelieved. Hence, their minds are blocked; they do not understand.
YENİSİ: Bu, onların inandıktan sonra inkâr etmelerindendir. Bunun sonucu olarak, zihinleri bloke edilmiştir; onlar anlamazlar.

value: When you see them, you may be impressed by their looks. And when they speak, you may listen to their eloquence. They are like standing logs. They think that every call is intended against them. These are the real enemies; beware of them. GOD condemns them; they have deviated.
YENİSİ: Onları gördüğünde, görünüşlerinden etkilenebilirsin. Ve konuştukları zaman belagatlerini dinleyebilirsin. Onlar dikili kütükler gibidir. Onlar, her seslenişi onlara karşı yöneltilmiş sanırlar. Bunlar gerçek düşmanlardır; onlara karşı dikkatli ol. TANRI onları kınamaktadır; onlar sapmışlardır.

value: When they are told, “Come let the messenger of GOD pray for your forgiveness,” they mockingly turn their heads, and you see them repel others and act arrogantly.
YENİSİ: Onlara, “Gelin TANRI’nın elçisi bağışlanmanız için dua etsin” denildiğinde alaycı bir şekilde kafalarını çevirirler ve sen onları başkalarını uzaklaştırırken ve kibirli davranırken görürsün.

value: It is the same for them, whether you pray for their forgiveness, or not pray for their forgiveness; GOD will not forgive them. For GOD does not guide the wicked people.
YENİSİ: İster bağışlanmaları için dua et, ister bağışlanmaları için dua etme, onlar için aynıdır; TANRI onları bağışlamayacaktır. Zira TANRI kötü insanlara rehberlik etmez.

value: They are the ones who say, “Do not give any money to those who followed the messenger of GOD, perhaps they abandon him!” However, GOD possesses the treasures of the heavens and the earth, but the hypocrites do not comprehend.
YENİSİ: Onlar, “TANRI’nın elçisine uymuş olanlara hiçbir para vermeyin, belki onu terk ederler!” diyen kimselerdir. Oysa, TANRI göklerin ve yeryüzünün hazinelerine sahiptir, fakat ikiyüzlüler idrak etmezler.

value: They say, “If we go back to the city, the powerful therein will evict the weak (and we will be victimized).” (They should know that) all dignity belongs to GOD and His messenger, and the believers. However, the hypocrites do not know.
O you who believe, do not be distracted by your money and your children from remembering GOD. Those who do this are the losers.
You shall give from our provisions to you before death comes to you, then you say, “My Lord, if only You could delay this for a short while! I would then be charitable and join the righteous!”
GOD never delays the appointed time of death for any soul. GOD is fully Cognizant of everything you do.
A Chip On Their Shoulders
YENİSİ: Onlar Kavga Etmeye Yer Ararlar

value: The Myth of Intercession\nShattered*
Glorifying GOD is everything in the heavens and everything on earth. To Him belongs all kingship, and to Him belongs all praise, and He is Omnipotent.
YENİSİ: Göklerdeki her şey ve yeryüzündeki her şey TANRI’yı yüceltmektedir. Tüm krallık O’na aittir ve tüm övgüler O’na aittir ve O, Her Şeye Gücü Yetendir.

value: He is the One who created you, then among you there is the disbeliever, and the believer. GOD is fully Seer of everything you do.
He created the heavens and the earth for a specific purpose,* designed you and perfected your design, then to Him is the final destiny.
YENİSİ: O, gökleri ve yeryüzünü spesifik bir amaç* için yarattı, sizi tasarladı ve tasarımınızı mükemmel hâle getirdi, sonra son varışınız O’nadır.

value: He knows everything in the heavens and the earth, and He knows everything you conceal and everything you declare. GOD is fully aware of the innermost thoughts.
YENİSİ: O, göklerdeki ve yeryüzündeki her şeyi bilir ve O, gizlediğiniz her şeyi ve beyan ettiğiniz her şeyi bilir. TANRI en içteki düşüncelerin tamamen farkındadır.

value:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦

(Al-Taghaabun)
In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
YENİSİ:

Sure 64: Karşılıklı Suçlama
(El-Teğabun)
En Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: *63:6 Millions of people idolize their prophets because of this myth (Appendix 8).
YENİSİ: *63:6 Milyonlarca insan bu efsaneden dolayı peygamberlerini putlaştırırlar (Ek 8).

value: *64:3 We are in this world due to God’s immense mercy. The Most Gracious has given us a chance to redeem ourselves. See the Introduction and Appendix 7.
YENİSİ: *64:3 Biz Tanrı’nın engin merhametinden sayesinde bu dünyadayız. En Lütufkâr Olan, kendimizi kurtarmamız için bize bir şans vermiştir. Giriş’e ve Ek 7’ye bakınız.

value: Mutual Blaming (Al-Taghaabun) 64:5-18
YENİSİ: Karşılıklı Suçlama (El-Teğabun) 64:5-18

value: Have you noted those who disbelieved in the past, then suffered the consequences of their decision? They incurred a painful retribution.

This is because their messengers went to them with clear proofs, but they said, “Shall we follow humans like us?” They disbelieved and turned away. GOD does not need them; GOD is in no need, Praiseworthy.
YENİSİ: Bunun nedeni elçilerinin onlara apaçık kanıtlarla gitmeleri, fakat onların “Bizim gibi insanlara mı uyalım?” demeleriydi. İnkâr ettiler ve yüz çevirdiler. TANRI’nın onlara ihtiyacı yoktur; TANRI’nın hiçbir şeye ihtiyacı yoktur, Övgüye Layık Olandır.

value: Those who disbelieved claim that they will not be resurrected! Yes indeed, by my Lord, you will be resurrected, and you will be held accountable for everything you have done. This is easy for GOD to do.
Therefore, you shall believe in GOD and His messenger, and the light that we have revealed herein. GOD is fully Cognizant of everything you do.

The day will come when He summons you to the Day of Summoning. That is the Day of Mutual Blaming. Anyone who believes in GOD and leads a righteous life, He will remit his sins, and will admit him into gardens with flowing streams. They abide therein forever. This is the greatest triumph.
YENİSİ: O'nun sizi Toplanma Günü’ne çağıracağı gün gelecek. İşte bu, Karşılıklı Suçlama Günü’dür. Kim TANRI’ya iman edip doğru bir hayat sürerse, O onların günahlarını örter ve onları akan nehirleri olan bahçelere kabul eder. Orada sonsuza dek kalacaklardır. En büyük zafer budur.

value: As for those who disbelieve and reject our revelations, they are the dwellers of the Hell-fire; they abide therein forever. What a miserable destiny!
YENİSİ: İnkâr eden ve vahiylerimizi reddedenlere gelince, onlar da Cehennem Ateşinin sakinleridir; orada sonsuza dek kalırlar. Ne sefil bir kader!

value: Nothing happens to you except in accordance with GOD’s will. Anyone who believes in GOD, He will guide his heart. GOD is fully aware of all things.
You shall obey GOD and you shall obey the messenger. If you turn away, then the sole mission of our messenger is to deliver the message.
GOD: there is no other god besides Him. In GOD the believers shall trust.
YENİSİ: TANRI: O’nun dışında başka hiçbir tanrı yoktur. TANRI’ya güvensin imanlılar.

value: O you who believe, your spouses and your children can be your enemies; beware. If you pardon, forget, and forgive, then GOD is Forgiver, Most Merciful.
YENİSİ: Ey inananlar, eşleriniz ve evlatlarınız düşmanlarınız olabilir; dikkatli olun. Eğer affeder, unutur ve bağışlarsanız, o zaman TANRI Bağışlayıcıdır, En Merhametli Olandır.

value: Your money and children are a test, and GOD possesses a great recompense.
Therefore, you shall reverence GOD as much as you can, and listen, and obey, and give (to charity) for your own good. Anyone who is protected from his own stinginess, these are the successful ones.
If you lend GOD a loan of righteousness, He will multiply the reward for you manifold, and forgive you. GOD is Appreciative, Clement.
The Knower of all secrets and declarations; the Almighty, Most Wise.
YENİSİ: Bütün sırları ve beyanları Bilen; Kudretli, En Bilge Olan.

value: Divine Law
YENİSİ: Göksel Yasa

value: Divorce (Al-Talaaq) 65:1-10
YENİSİ: Boşanma (El-Talak) 65:1-10

value: O you prophet, when you people divorce the women, you shall ensure that a divorce interim is fulfilled. You shall measure such an interim precisely.* You shall reverence GOD your Lord. Do not evict them from their homes, nor shall you make life miserable for them, to force them to leave on their own, unless they commit a proven adultery. These are GOD’s laws. Anyone who transgresses GOD’s laws commits an injustice against himself. You never know; maybe GOD wills something good to come out of this.
YENİSİ: Ey peygamber, siz insanlar kadınları boşadığınız zaman bir boşanma bekleme döneminin tamamlandığından emin olun. Bu bekleme dönemini tam olarak hesaplayın.* Rabbiniz TANRI’ya derin saygı duyun. İspatlanmış bir zina suçu işlemedikleri sürece onları evlerinden çıkarmayın, kendi başlarına ayrılmaya zorlamak için hayatı onlara zehir etmeyin. Bunlar TANRI’nın yasalarıdır. TANRI’nın yasalarını çiğneyen herkes kendi aleyhine bir adaletsizlik yapmış olur. Asla bilemezsin; belki de TANRI bundan iyi bir şey çıkmasını irade ediyordur.

value: Once the interim is fulfilled, you may reconcile with them equitably, or go through with the separation equitably. You shall have two equitable witnesses witness the divorce before GOD. This is to enlighten those who believe in GOD and the Last Day. Anyone who reverences GOD, He will create an exit for him.
YENİSİ: Bekleme dönemi tamamlandığında, onlarla adil bir şekilde uzlaşabilirsiniz, ya da ayrılığı adil bir şekilde tamamlarsınız. TANRI’nın huzurunda boşanmaya iki adil şahidin şahitlik etmesini sağlayın. Bu, TANRI’ya ve Son Gün’e inananları aydınlatmak içindir. Her kim TANRI’ya derin saygı duyarsa, O ona bir çıkış yolu yaratacaktır.

value: And will provide for him whence he never expected. Anyone who trusts in GOD, He suffices him. GOD’s commands are done. GOD has decreed for everything its fate.

As for the women who have reached menopause, if you have any doubts, their interim shall be three months. As for those who do not menstruate, and discover that they are pregnant, their interim ends upon giving birth. Anyone who reverences GOD, He makes everything easy for him.
YENİSİ: Menopoza ulaşmış kadınlara gelince, eğer herhangi bir şüpheniz varsa, onların bekleme süresi üç ay olsun. Regl olmayanlara gelince, gebe olduklarını keşfederlerse, onların bekleme süresi doğum yapmakla sona erer. Her kim TANRI’ya derin saygı duyarsa, O onun için her şeyi kolaylaştırır.

value: This is GOD’s command that He sends down to you. Anyone who reverences GOD, He remits his sins, and rewards him generously.
YENİSİ: Bu, TANRI’nın size indirdiği emridir. Kim TANRI’ya derin saygı duyarsa, O onun günahlarını örter ve onu cömertçe ödüllendirir.

value: You shall allow them to live in the same home in which they lived with you, and do not make life so miserable for them that they leave on their own. If they are pregnant, you shall spend on them until they give birth. If they nurse the infant, you shall pay them for this service. You shall maintain the amicable relations among you. If you disagree, you may hire another woman to nurse the child.
YENİSİ: Sizinle birlikte yaşadıkları aynı evde yaşamalarına izin verin ve kendi başlarına ayrılsınlar diye onlara hayatı o kadar zehir etmeyin. Eğer gebe iseler, doğuruncaya kadar onlar için harcama yapın. Eğer bebeği emzirirlerse, bu hizmet için onlara ücretlerini ödeyin. Aranızdaki dostane ilişkileri sürdürün. Eğer anlaşmazlığa düşerseniz, çocuğu emzirmesi için başka bir kadını tutabilirsiniz.

value: The rich husband shall provide support in accordance with his means, and the poor shall provide according to the means that GOD bestowed upon him. GOD does not impose on any soul more than He has given it. GOD will provide ease after difficulty.
Many a community rebelled against the commands of its Lord and against His messengers. Consequently, we held them strictly accountable, and requited them a terrible requital.
YENİSİ: Birçok topluluk, Rabbinin buyruklarına ve O’nun elçilerine karşı isyan etti. Bunun sonucunda biz de onları sıkı bir biçimde hesaba çektik ve onlara korkunç bir misillemeyle karşılık verdik.

value: They suffered the consequences of their decisions; a profound loss.
GOD has prepared for them severe retribution. Therefore, you shall reverence GOD, O you who possess intelligence and believed. GOD has sent down to you a message −*

♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sura 65: Divorce
(Al-Talaaq)
In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
