♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sure 65: Boşanma
(El-Talak)
En Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: *65:1 The divorcee’s interim, before becoming eligible for remarriage, is a waiting period of three menstruations. This ensures that the divorcee was not pregnant (2:228).
YENİSİ: *65:1 Boşanmış kadının bekleme süresi, yeniden evlenmeye uygun olmadan önce, üç regl dönemi boyunca beklemekdir. Bu, boşanmış kadının gebe olmadığını garanti eder (2:228).

value: *65:10-11 The “Messenger” here is clearly the Quran. Verse 10 talks about “sending down a message,” and this points to the Quran as the messenger in 65:11 (Appendix 20).
Divorce (Al-Talaaq) 65:11-12 & Prohibition (Al-Tahreem) 66:1-8
YENİSİ: Boşanma (El-Talak) 65:11-12 & Haram Kılmak (El-Tahrim) 66:1-8

value: a messenger* who recites to you GOD’s revelations, clearly, to lead those who believe and work righteousness out of the darkness into the light. Anyone who believes in GOD and leads a righteous life, He will admit him into gardens with flowing streams; they abide therein forever. GOD will generously reward him.
GOD created seven universes and the same number of earths. The commands flow among them. This is to let you know that GOD is Omnipotent, and that GOD is fully aware of all things.
Seven Universes And Seven Earths*
O you prophet, why do you prohibit what GOD has made lawful for you, just to please your wives? GOD is Forgiver, Merciful.*
GOD has decreed for you the laws dealing with your oaths. GOD is your Lord, and He is the Omniscient, Most Wise.

The prophet had trusted some of his wives with a certain statement, then one of them spread it, and GOD let him know about it. He then informed his wife of part of the issue, and disregarded part. She asked him, “Who informed you of this?” He said, “I was informed by the Omniscient, Most Cognizant.”
YENİSİ: Peygamber, belirli bir lafı eşlerinden bazılarına emanet etmişti, ardından onlardan biri onu yaydı ve TANRI bunu ona haber verdi. Sonra o, eşine meselenin bir kısmını bildirdi ve bir kısmını göz ardı etti. Eşi ona, “Bunu sana kim bildirdi?” diye sordu. Dedi ki: “Ben, Her Şeyi Bilen ve En Haberdar Olan tarafından bilgilendirildim.”

value: If the two of you repent to GOD, then your hearts have listened. But if you band together against him, then GOD is his ally, and so is Gabriel and the righteous believers. Also, the angels are his helpers.

If he divorces you, his Lord will substitute other wives in your place who are better than you; submitters (Muslims), believers (Mu’mens), obedient, repentant, worshipers, pious, either previously married, or virgins.
YENİSİ: Eğer sizi boşarsa, onun Rabbi yerinizi sizden daha iyi eşlerle değiştirecektir; teslim olanlar (Müslümanlar), inananlar (Mü’minler), itaatkâr olan, tövbekâr olan, tapınanlar, takva sahibi olan, gerek daha önce evlenmiş olsun gerekse bakire olsun.

value: O you who believe, protect yourselves and your families from the Hellfire whose fuel is people and rocks. Guarding it are stern and powerful angels who never disobey GOD; they do whatever they are commanded to do.
O you who disbelieved, do not apologize today. You are being requited only for what you did.
YENİSİ: Ey inkâr etmiş olanlar, bugün özür dilemeyin. Size yalnızca yapmış olduklarınızın karşılığı veriliyor.

value: O you who believe, you shall repent to GOD a firm repentance. Your Lord will then remit your sins and admit you into gardens with flowing streams. On that day, GOD will not disappoint the prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will radiate in front of them and to their right. They will say, “Our Lord, perfect our light for us, and forgive us; You are Omnipotent.”

Sura 66: Prohibition
(Al-Tahreem)
In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
YENİSİ:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sure 66: Haram Kılmak
(El-Tahrim)
En Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: The Believers Repent
*65:11 See footnote for 65:10-11.

*65:12 Although God created six other planets that are identical to our Earth, there is life only on our planet. Thus, the evolutionists will be shown on the Day of Judgment that life did not just “evolve” on the planet because of its particular circumstances.
*66:1 Mohammedans around the world believe that Muhammad was infallible. This verse teaches us that he was indeed a fallible human being (18:110, 33:37, 40:66, 80:1).
Prohibition (Al-Tahreem) 66:9-12 & Kingship (Al-Mulk) 67:1-12
YENİSİ: Haram Kılmak (El-Tahrim) 66:9-12 & Krallık (El-Mülk) 67:1-12

value: O prophet, struggle against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be stern with them. Their abode is Gehenna, and a miserable destiny.
YENİSİ: Ey peygamber, inkârcılara ve ikiyüzlülere karşı mücadele et ve onlara karşı amansız ol. Onların meskeni Cehennemdir ayrıca sefil bir kader.

value: GOD cites as examples of those who disbelieved the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were married to two of our righteous servants, but they betrayed them and, consequently, they could not help them at all against GOD. The two of them were told, “Enter the Hellfire with those who deserved it.”

And GOD cites as an example of those who believed the wife of Pharaoh. She said, “My Lord, build a home for me at You in Paradise, and save me from Pharaoh and his works; save me from the transgressing people.”
Also Mary, the Amramite. She maintained her chastity, then we blew into her from our spirit. She believed in the words of her Lord and His scriptures; she was obedient.
YENİSİ: Ayrıca İmran ailesinden Meryem. O, iffetini korudu, sonra biz onun içine bizim ruhumuzdan üfledik. O, Rabbinin kelimelerine ve O’nun kutsal yazılarına inandı; o itaatkârdı.

value: The Myth of Intercession Shattered
Examples of the Believers: Pharaoh’s Wife
YENİSİ: İnananların Örnekleri: Firavun’un Karısı

value: Mary
YENİSİ: Meryem

value: Most exalted is the One in whose hands is all kingship, and He is Omnipotent.
YENİSİ: Tüm krallığı elinde bulunduran O En yücedir ve O, Her Şeye Gücü Yetendir.

value: The One who created death and life for the purpose of distinguishing those among you who would do better.* He is the Almighty, the Forgiving.
He created seven universes in layers. You do not see any imperfection in the creation by the Most Gracious. Keep looking; do you see any flaw?
Look again and again; your eyes will come back stumped and conquered.
We adorned the lowest universe with lamps, and guarded its borders with projectiles against the devils; we prepared for them a retribution in Hell.
For those who disbelieved in their Lord, the retribution of Gehenna. What a miserable destiny.
YENİSİ: Rablerini inkâr etmiş olanlar için Cehennem azabı. Ne sefil bir kader.

value: When they get thrown therein, they hear its furor as it fumes.
YENİSİ: Oraya atıldıklarında, o ateş püskürürken gürültüsünü işitirler.

value: It almost explodes from rage. Whenever a group is thrown therein, its guards would ask them, “Did you not receive a warner?”
YENİSİ: Hiddetinden neredeyse patlar. Ne zaman içine bir grup atılsa, onun bekçileri onlara “Bir uyarıcı almadınız mı?” diye sorarlar.

value: They would answer, “Yes indeed; a warner did come to us, but we disbelieved and said, ‘GOD did not reveal anything. You are totally astray.’ ”
They also say, “If we heard or understood, we would not be among the dwellers of Hell!”
Thus, they confessed their sins. Woe to the dwellers of Hell.
As for those who reverence their Lord, when alone in their privacy, they have attained forgiveness and a great recompense.
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦\nSura 67: Kingship (Al-Mulk)\nIn the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
YENİSİ: ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦\nSure 67: Krallık (El-Mülk)\nEn Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: The Purpose of Our Life*
YENİSİ: Hayatımızın Amacı*

value: *67:2 See the Introduction and Appendix 7 for details of the purpose behind this world.
YENİSİ: *67:2 Bu dünyanın ardındaki amacın detayları için Giriş’e ve Ek 7’ye bakınız.

value: Kingship (Al-Mulk) 67:13-30 & The Pen (Al-Qalam) 68:1-2
YENİSİ: Krallık (El-Mülk) 67:13-30 & Kalem (El-Kalem) 68:1-2

value: Whether you keep your utterances secret, or declare them, He is fully aware of the innermost thoughts.
YENİSİ: Sözlerinizi ister sır olarak saklayın ister onları beyan edin, O, en içteki düşüncelerin tamamen farkındadır.

value: Should He not know what He created? He is the Sublime, Most Cognizant.
He is the One who put the Earth at your service. Roam its corners, and eat from His provisions. To Him is the final summoning.
Have you guaranteed that the One in heaven will not strike the earth and cause it to tumble?
Have you guaranteed that the One in heaven will not send upon you a violent storm? Will you then appreciate the value of My warning?
Others before them have disbelieved; how terrible was My requital!
YENİSİ: Onlardan önce başkaları da inkâr etmişlerdi; Benim misillemem nasıl da korkunçtu!

value: Have they not seen the birds above them lined up in columns and spreading their wings? The Most Gracious is the One who holds them in the air. He is Seer of all things.
Where are those soldiers who can help you against the Most Gracious? Indeed, the disbelievers are deceived.
Who is there to provide for you, if He withholds His provisions? Indeed, they have plunged deep into transgression and aversion.
YENİSİ: Eğer O, rızıklarını kısıtlarsa, size rızık sağlayacak kim var? Doğrusu, onlar haddi aşma ve tiksinti içine derinlemesine saplanmışlardır.

value: Is one who walks while slumped over on his face better guided, or one who walks straight on the right path?
Say, “He is the One who initiated you, and granted you the hearing, the eyes, and the brains. Rarely are you appreciative.”
Say, “He is the One who placed you on earth, and before Him you will be summoned.”
They challenge: “When will that prophecy come to pass, if you are truthful?”
Say, “Such knowledge is with GOD; I am no more than a manifest warner.”
YENİSİ: De ki: “Bu tür bilgiler TANRI’nın yanındadır; Ben apaçık bir uyarıcıdan fazlası değilim.”

value: When they see it happening, the faces of those who disbelieved will turn miserable, and it will be proclaimed: “This is what you used to mock.”
YENİSİ: Onu gerçekleşirken gördüklerinde, inkâr etmiş olanların yüzleri perişan hâle gelecek ve ilan edilecektir: “İşte bu, vaktiyle alay ettiğiniz şeydir.”

value: Say, “Whether GOD decides to annihilate me and those with me, or to shower us with His mercy, who is there to protect the disbelievers from a painful retribution?”
YENİSİ: De ki: “TANRI beni ve benimle birlikte olanları imha etmeye karar verse de bize merhametini yağdırsa da, inkârcıları acı veren bir azaptan koruyacak kim var?”

value: Say, “He is the Most Gracious; we believe in Him, and we trust in Him. You will surely find out who is really far astray.”
Say, “What if your water sinks away, who will provide you with pure water?”
NuN,* the pen, and what they (the people) write.
YENİSİ: NuN,* kalem ve onların (insanların) yazdıkları.

value: You have attained a great blessing from your Lord; you are not crazy.
YENİSİ: Sen Rabbinden büyük bir nimete eriştin; sen deli değilsin.

value:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sura 68: The Pen
(Al-Qalam)
In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
YENİSİ:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sure 68: Kalem
(El-Kalem)
En Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: *68:1 “NuN” is unique among the Quran’s miraculous initials. See Appendix 1.
YENİSİ: *68:1 “NuN,” Kuran’ın mucizevi başlangıç harfleri arasında benzersizdir. Ek 1’e bakınız.

value: The Pen (Al-Qalam) 68:3-41
YENİSİ: Kalem (El-Kalem) 68:3-41

value: You have attained a recompense that is well deserved.
YENİSİ: Sen tamamen hak ettiğin bir mükâfata eriştin.

value: You are blessed with a great moral character.
You will see, and they will see.
Which of you are condemned.
Your Lord is fully aware of those who strayed off His path, and He is fully aware of those who are guided.
Do not obey the rejectors.
They wish that you compromise, so they too can compromise.
YENİSİ: Onlar senin taviz vermeni arzu ederler, böylece onlar da taviz verebilirler.

value: Do not obey every lowly swearer.
A slanderer, a backbiter.
Forbidder of charity, a transgressor, a sinner.
YENİSİ: Hayra engel olana, bir haddi aşana, bir günahkâra.

value: Unappreciative, and greedy.
Even though he possessed enough money and children.
When our revelations are recited to him, he says, “Tales from the past!”
We will mark his face.
We have tested them like we tested the owners of the garden who swore that they will harvest it in the morning.
They were so absolutely sure.
A passing (storm) from your Lord passed by it while they were asleep.
By morning, it was barren.
They called on each other in the morning.
“Let us harvest the crop.”
On their way, they confided to each other.
That from then on, none of them would be poor.
They were so absolutely sure of their harvest.
But when they saw it, they said, “We were so wrong!
“Now, we have nothing!”
The righteous among them said, “If only you had glorified (God)!”
They said, “Glory be to our Lord. We have transgressed.”
They started to blame each other.
They said, “Woe to us. We sinned.
“May our Lord grant us a better one. We repent to our Lord.”
Such was the requital. But the retribution of the Hereafter is far worse, if they only knew.
YENİSİ: Karşılık işte böyleydi. Oysa Ahiretin azabı çok daha kötüdür, bir bilselerdi.

value: The righteous have deserved, at their Lord, gardens of bliss.
Shall we treat the Submitters like the criminals?
What is wrong with your logic?
YENİSİ: Mantığınızdaki sorun nedir?

value: Do you have another book to uphold?
YENİSİ: Bağlı kalacağınız başka bir kitabınız mı var?

value: In it, do you find anything you want?
YENİSİ: Onun içinde istediğiniz herhangi bir şeyi buluyor musunuz?

value: Or, have you received solemn assurances from us that grant you whatever you wish on the Day of Resurrection?
YENİSİ: Yahut, Diriliş Günü’nde size arzu ettiğiniz her şeyi bahşedeceğimize dair bizden sağlam güvenceler mi aldınız?

value: Ask them, “Who guarantees this for you?”
YENİSİ: Onlara sor: “Bunu size kim garanti ediyor?”

value: Do they have idols? Let their idols help them, if they are truthful.
YENİSİ: Onların putları mı var? Varsın putları kendilerine yardım etsin, eğer doğru sözlü iseler.

value: They Should Have Said:\n“God Willing.”
YENİSİ: Onların “Tanrı İrade Ediyorsa”\nDemeleri Gerekirdi

value: The Pen (Al-Qalam) 68:42-52 & Incontestable (Al-Haaqqah) 69:1-17
YENİSİ: Kalem (El-Kalem) 68:42-52 & Tartışılamaz (El-Hakka) 69:1-17

value: The day will come when they will be exposed, and they will be required to fall prostrate, but they will be unable to.
YENİSİ: Gün gelecek, onlar ifşa edilecekler ve onların secdeye kapanmaları gerekecek, fakat buna güç yetiremeyecekler.

value: With their eyes subdued, humiliation will cover them. They were invited to fall prostrate when they were whole and able.
YENİSİ: Bakışları alçalmış hâlde, aşağılanma onları kaplayacaktır. Onlar sağlam ve güçleri yetiyorken secdeye kapanmaya davet edilmişlerdi.

value: Therefore, let Me deal with those who reject this Hadith; we will lead them on whence they never perceive.
YENİSİ: Öyleyse, bırak bu Hadis’i reddedenlerle Ben ilgileneyim; onları asla kestiremedikleri yerden sonlarına sürükleyeceğiz.

value: I will give them enough rope; My scheming is formidable.
YENİSİ: Ben, onlara yeterince hareket özgürlüğü tanıyacağım; Benim planlamam çetindir.

value: Are you asking them for money, so they are burdened by the fine?
Do they know the future? Do they have it recorded?
You shall steadfastly persevere in carrying out the commands of your Lord. Do not be like (Jonah) who called from inside the fish.
YENİSİ: Rabbinin emirlerini yerine getirmede kararlılıkla sebat et. Balığın içinden seslenmiş olan (Yunus) gibi olma.

value: If it were not for his Lord’s grace, he would have been ejected into the desert as a sinner.
But his Lord blessed him, and made him righteous.
Those who disbelieved show their ridicule in their eyes when they hear the message and say, “He is crazy!”
It is in fact a message to the world.
The incontestable (event).
YENİSİ: Tartışılamaz (olay).

value: What an incontestable (event)!
YENİSİ: Ne tartışılamaz bir (olay) ama!

value: It is truly incontestable.
YENİSİ: Tam olarak tartışılamaz.

value: Thamoud and ‘Aad disbelieved in the Shocker.
As for Thamoud, they were annihilated by the devastating (quake).
YENİSİ: Semûd’a gelince, onlar yıkıcı (sarsıntı) ile imha edildiler.

value: As for ‘Aad, they were annihilated by a persistent, violent storm.
YENİSİ: Âd’a gelince, onlar durmak bilmeyen, şiddetli bir kasırga ile imha edildiler.

value: He unleashed it upon them for seven nights and eight days, violently. You could see the people tossed around like decayed palm trunks.
Can you find any trace of them?
Pharaoh, others before him, and the sinners (of Sodom) were wicked.
They disobeyed the messenger of their Lord. Consequently, He requited them a devastating requital.
YENİSİ: Onlar, Rablerinin elçisine itaatsizlik ettiler. Sonuç olarak, O yıkıcı bir misillemeyle onlara karşılık verdi.

value: The flood was devastating, so we carried you on the floating (ark).
We rendered it a lesson for you, that any listening ear may understand.
When the horn is blown once.
YENİSİ: Sur bir kez üflendiğinde.

value: The earth and the mountains will be carried off and crushed; utterly crushed.
That is the day when the inevitable event will come to pass.
The heaven will crack, and fall apart.
The angels will be all around, and Your Lord’s dominion will then encompass eight (universes).*
YENİSİ: Her tarafta melekler olacak ve Rabbinin egemenliği o zaman sekiz (evreni) kuşatacaktır.*

value:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sura 69: Incontestable
(Al-Haaqqah)
In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
YENİSİ:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦

(El-Hakka)
En Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: *69:17 This earth is full of misery because of its physical distance from God, since it is in the seventh universe (7:143). In the Hereafter, an eighth universe will be created that will be even farther than our seventh universe; it will be called “Hell” (89:23).
YENİSİ: *69:17 Bu yeryüzü, Tanrı’dan olan fiziksel uzaklığı nedeniyle sefaletle doludur; çünkü yedinci evrendedir (7:143). Ahirette, bizim yedinci evrenimizden daha da uzak olacak olan sekizinci bir evren yaratılacaktır; ona “Cehennem” denecektir (89:23).

value: Incontestable (Al-Haaqqah) 69:18-52 & The Heights (Al-Ma‘aarej) 70:1-3
YENİSİ: Tartışılamaz (El-Hakka) 69:18-52 & Zirveler (El-Mearic) 70:1-3

value: On that day, you will be exposed, nothing of you can be hidden.
As for the one who receives his record with his right hand, he will say, “Come read my record.
“I did believe that I was going to be held accountable.”
He has deserved a happy life.
In an exalted Paradise.
Its fruits are within reach.
Eat and drink happily in return for your works in days past.
As for him who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, “Oh, I wish I never received my record.
“I wish I never knew my account.
“I wish my death was eternal.
“My money cannot help me.
“All my power is gone.”
Take him and shackle him.
Burn him in Hell.
In a chain that is seventy arms long, tie him up.
For he did not believe in GOD, Most Great.
YENİSİ: Zira o, En Büyük Olan TANRI’ya inanmadı.

value: Nor did he advocate the feeding of the poor.
YENİSİ: Yoksulu doyurmayı da savunmadı.

value: Consequently, he has no friend here.
Nor any food, except the bitter variety.
Food for the sinners.
I swear by what you see.
And what you do not see.
This is the utterance of an honorable messenger.
YENİSİ: Bu, şerefli bir elçinin sözüdür.

value: Not the utterance of a poet; rarely do you believe.
Nor the utterance of a soothsayer; rarely do you take heed.
A revelation from the Lord of the universe.
Had he uttered any other teachings.
We would have punished him.
We would have stopped the revelations to him.
None of you could have helped him.
This is a reminder for the righteous.
We know; some of you are rejectors.
It is but sorrow for the disbelievers.
It is the absolute truth.
Therefore, you shall glorify the name of your Lord, Most Great.
The Believers
The Disbelievers
Muhammad Forbidden from\nIssuing Any Religious Teachings
A questioner may question the inevitable retribution.
For the disbelievers, none can stop it.
From GOD; Possessor of the highest Height.

♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sura 70: The Heights
(Al-Ma‘aarej)
In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
YENİSİ:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦
Sure 70: Zirveler
(El-Mearic)
En Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: The Heights (Al-Ma‘aarej) 70:4-44
YENİSİ: Zirveler (El-Mearic) 70:4-44

value: The angels, with their reports, climb to Him in a day that equals fifty thousand years.
YENİSİ: Melekler, raporları ile, elli bin yıla eş değer bir günde O’na yükselirler.

value: Therefore, you shall resort to a gracious patience.
For they see it far away.
While we see it very close.
The day will come when the sky will be like molten rocks.
The mountains will be like fluffy wool.
No friend will care about his close friend.
When they see them, the guilty will wish he could give his own children as ransom, to spare him the retribution of that day.
Also his spouse, and his brother.
Even his whole tribe that raised him.
Even all the people on earth, if it would save him.
No; it is aflame.
Eager to burn.
It calls on those who turned away.
Those who hoarded and counted.
Indeed, the human being is anxious.
If touched by adversity, despondent.
If blessed by wealth, stingy.
Except for the worshipers.
Who always observe their contact prayers (Salat).
Part of their money is set aside.
YENİSİ: Paralarının bir kısmı ayrılmıştır.

value: For the poor and the needy.
YENİSİ: Yoksullar ve muhtaçlar için.

value: They believe in the Day of Judgment.
They reverence their Lord’s requital.
YENİSİ: Onlar Rablerinin vereceği karşılığa derin saygı duyarlar.

value: Their Lord’s requital is not taken for granted.
YENİSİ: Rablerinin vereceği karşılık hafife alınamaz.

value: They keep their chastity.
(They have relations) only with their spouses, or what is legally theirs—
anyone who transgresses these limits is a sinner.
And the believers keep their word; they are trustworthy.
Their testimony is truthful.
They consistently observe their contact prayers (Salat) on time.
They have deserved a position of honor in Paradise.
What is keeping those who disbelieved from joining you?
To the right, and to the left, they flee.
How can any of them expect to enter the blissful Paradise?
Never; we created them, and they know from what.
I solemnly swear by the Lord of the easts and the wests; we are able—
to substitute better people in your place; we can never be defeated.
Therefore, let them blunder and play, until they meet the day that is awaiting them.
YENİSİ: Bu nedenle, onları bekleyen güne kavuşuncaya dek varsın bocalayıp oynasınlar.

value: That is the day they come out of the graves in a hurry, as if herded to the (sacrificial) altars.
YENİSİ: İşte o gün, kabirlerden aceleyle çıkacaklar, sanki (kurban kesilen) sunaklara sürülüyormuş gibi.

value: With their eyes subdued, shame will cover them. That is the day that is awaiting them.
We sent Noah to his people: “You shall warn your people before a painful retribution afflicts them.”
He said, “O my people, I am a manifest warner to you.
YENİSİ: Dedi ki: “Ey halkım, ben size apaçık bir uyarıcıyım.

value: “To alert you that you shall worship GOD, reverence Him, and obey me.
“He will then forgive you your sins and respite you for a predetermined period. Most assuredly, GOD’s appointment can never be delayed, once it is due, if you only knew.”
YENİSİ: “O sonra sizi, günahlarınızı bağışlayacak ve size önceden belirlenmiş bir süre için mühlet verecek. Muhakkak ki, TANRI’nın tayin ettiği vade, vakti geldiğinde asla ertelenemez, bir bilseydiniz.”

value: He said, “My Lord, I have invited my people night and day.
“But my invitation only increased their aversion.
YENİSİ: “Fakat benim davetim onların sadece tiksinmelerini artırdı.

value: “Whenever I invited them to be forgiven by You, they placed their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their clothes, insisted, and turned arrogant.
“Then I invited them publicly.
YENİSİ: “Sonra onları alenen davet ettim.

value: “Then I proclaimed to them loudly, and I spoke to them privately.
YENİSİ: “Sonra onlara yüksek sesle ilan ettim ve onlarla özel olarak da konuştum.

value: “I said, ‘Implore your Lord for forgiveness; He is Forgiving.
“ ‘He will then shower you generously with rain.
“ ‘And provide you with money and children, and orchards, and streams.’ ”
Why should you not strive to reverence GOD?
He is the One who created you in stages.
YENİSİ: Sizi evreler halinde yaratan O’dur.

value: Do you not realize that GOD created seven universes in layers?
YENİSİ: TANRI’nın yedi evreni katmanlar halinde yarattığını fark etmiyor musunuz?

value: He designed the moon therein to be a light, and placed the sun to be a lamp.
And GOD germinated you from the earth like plants.
Then He returns you into it, and He will surely bring you out.
GOD made the earth habitable for you.
YENİSİ: TANRI yeryüzünü sizin için yaşanabilir kıldı.

value: That you may build roads therein.
Noah said, “My Lord, they disobeyed me, and followed those who were even more corrupted when blessed with money and children.
“They schemed terrible schemes.
YENİSİ: “Onlar korkunç planlar kurdular.

value: “They said, ‘Do not abandon your gods. Do not abandon Wadd, Suwaa‘, Yaghouth, Ya‘ooq, and Nasr.
“They misled many. Therefore, let the wicked plunge deeper into loss.”
YENİSİ: “Birçoklarını saptırdılar. Bu nedenle, izin ver, o kötüler zarar içine daha derin saplansınlar.”

value: Because of their sins they were drowned and assigned to the hellfire. They found no helpers to protect them from GOD.
Noah also said, “My Lord, do not leave a single disbeliever on earth.
“For if you let them, they will only mislead your servants and give birth to nothing but wicked disbelievers.
“My Lord, forgive me and my parents, and anyone who enters my home as a believer, and all the believing men and women. But do not give the disbelievers anything but annihilation.”
YENİSİ: “Rabbim, beni, ebeveynlerimi, evime bir inanan olarak giren herkesi ve tüm inanan erkek ve kadınları bağışla. Fakat inkârcılara imhadan başka bir şey verme.”

value: ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦\nSura 71: Noah\nIn the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
YENİSİ: ♦ ♦ ♦ ♦\nSure 71: Nuh\nEn Lütufkâr ve En Merhametli Olan Tanrı’nın adıyla.

value: Jinns (Al-Jinn) 72:1-21
YENİSİ: Cinler (El-Cin) 72:1-21

value: Say, “I was inspired that a group of jinns listened, then said, ‘We have heard a wonderful Quran.*
YENİSİ: De ki: “Bana, cinlerden bir grubun dinlediği, sonra da şöyle söyledikleri ilham edildi, ‘Biz müthiş bir Kuran işittik.*

value: “ ‘It guides to righteousness, and we have believed in it; we will never set up any idols beside our Lord.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Doğruluğa yönlendiriyor ve biz ona inandık; biz asla Rabbimizin yanında herhangi bir put edinmeyeceğiz.

value: “ ‘The Most High is our only Lord. He never had a mate, nor a son.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Yüceler Yücesi bizim tek Rabbimizdir. O’nun asla bir eşi de bir oğlu da olmamıştır.

value: “ ‘It is the foolish among us who used to utter such nonsense about GOD.
YENİSİ: “ ‘TANRI hakkında böyle saçmalıkları vaktiyle dile getirenler, aramızdaki o budalalardır.

value: “ ‘We thought that neither the humans, nor the jinns, could possibly utter lies about GOD.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Biz ne insanların ne de cinlerin TANRI hakkında yalan uydurmasının mümkün olmadığını sanmıştık.

value: “ ‘Human beings used to seek power through jinn beings, but they only afflicted them with a lot of adversity.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Vaktiyle insanlar cinler aracılığıyla güç ararlardı, fakat onlar sadece pek çok sıkıntıyı onlara musallat ederdi.

value: “ ‘They thought, just like you thought, that GOD would not send another (messenger).
YENİSİ: “ ‘Onlar, tıpkı sizin de düşündüğünüz gibi TANRI’nın başka bir (elçi) göndermeyeceğini sanıyorlardı.

value: “ ‘We touched the heaven and found it filled with formidable guards and projectiles.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Biz göğe dokunduk ve onu zorlu muhafızlar ve mermilerle dolu bulduk.

value: “ ‘We used to sit there in order to spy. Anyone who listens is pursued by a powerful projectile.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Vaktiyle casusluk yapmak için orada otururduk. Her kim dinlerse, güçlü bir mermi tarafından takip edilir.

value: “ ‘We have no idea if something bad is intended for the inhabitants of Earth, or if their Lord wills to redeem them.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Yeryüzünün sakinleri için kötü bir şey mi amaçlanıyor, yoksa Rableri onları kurtarmayı mı irade ediyor, hiçbir fikrimiz yok.

value: “ ‘Some of us are righteous, and some are less than righteous; we follow various paths.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Kimimiz doğrudur ve kimimiz doğrulukta eksiktir; biz çeşitli yollar takip ediyoruz.

value: “ ‘We knew full well that we can never run away from GOD on Earth; we can never run away and escape.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Yeryüzünde TANRI’dan asla kaçamayacağımızı gayet iyi anladık; biz asla kaçıp kurtulamayız.

value: “ ‘When we heard the guidance, we believed therein. Anyone who believes in his Lord will never fear any injustice, nor any affliction.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Biz kılavuzu işittiğimizde onda bulunana inandık. Her kim Rabbine inanırsa, ne herhangi bir haksızlıktan ne de herhangi bir sıkıntıdan korkacaktır.

value: “ ‘Among us are the submitters, and among us are the compromisers.’ ” As for those who submitted, they are on the right path.
YENİSİ: “ ‘Aramızda teslim olanlar da var, tavizkâr olanlar da var.’ ” Teslim olanlara gelince, onlar doğru yoldadırlar.

value: As for the compromisers, they will be fuel for Gehenna.
YENİSİ: Tavizkâr olanlara gelince, onlar Cehennem için yakıt olacaklardır.

value: If they remain on the right path, we will bless them with abundant water.
YENİSİ: Eğer onlar doğru yolda devam ederlerse, onları bol su ile nimetlendireceğiz.

value: We will surely test them all. As for him who disregards the message of his Lord, He will direct him to ever increasing retribution.
YENİSİ: Biz mutlaka hepsini test edeceğiz. Rabbinin mesajını göz ardı eden kişiye gelince, O, onu sürekli artan bir azaba yöneltecektir.

value: The places of worship belong to GOD; do not call on anyone else beside GOD.
YENİSİ: Tapınma yerleri TANRI’ya aittir; TANRI’nın yanı sıra hiç kimseye çağrıda bulunmayın.

value: When GOD’s servant* advocated Him alone, almost all of them banded together to oppose him.
YENİSİ: TANRI’nın kulu* yalnızca O’nu savunduğunda, neredeyse hepsi ona muhalefet etmek için tek vücut oldu.

value: Say, “I worship only my Lord; I never set up any idols beside Him.”
YENİSİ: De ki: “Ben sadece Rabbime taparım; ben asla O’nun yanında hiçbir put edinmem.”

value: Say, “I possess no power to harm you, nor to guide you.”
YENİSİ: De ki: “Ben ne size zarar verme ne de size rehberlik etme gücüne sahibim.”

value:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦

(Al-Jinn)

YENİSİ:
♦ ♦ ♦ ♦

value: God’s Messenger of\nthe Covenant*
YENİSİ: Tanrı’nın Antlaşma Elçisi*

value: *72:1-28 The messenger here is named, mathematically, as “Rashad Khalifa,” to whom God revealed the end of the world (Appendix 25). The number of verses from 1:1 to 72:27, where the messenger is mentioned, is 5472, 19x72x4. The word “Rashada” occurs 4 times in Sura 72. The value of “Rashada” is 504, and 504 + 28 (verses of Sura 72) is 532, 19x28. The value of “Rashad Khalifa” (1230) + 72 + 28 = 1330 = 19x70. The digits of Sura 72 and its number of verses (28) add up to 7 + 2 + 2 + 8 = 19. Also, the crucial expression, “only to a messenger that He chooses” has a value of 1919, 19x101.
YENİSİ: *72:1-28 Buradaki elçi, dünyanın sonunu Tanrı’nın kendisine vahyettiği kişi, matematiksel olarak, “Reşad Halife” şeklinde adlandırılır (Ek 25). 1:1'den, elçinin anıldığı 72:27'ye ayetine kadar ayet sayısı 5472'dir, 19 x 72 x 4. “Reşede” kelimesi Sure 72’de 4 kez geçmektedir. “Reşede”nin değeri 504’tür; 504 + 28 (Sure 72’nin ayet sayısı) 532'dir, 19 x 28. “Reşad Halife”nin değeri (1230) + 72 + 28 = 1330 = 19 x 70. Sure 72’nin numarası ve ayet sayısının (28) rakamları toplanınca 7 + 2 + 2 + 8 = 19 elde edilir. Ayrıca, kıritik “sadece O'nun seçtiği bir elçiye” ifadesinin değeri 1919'dur, 19 x 101.

value: He is certainly able to resurrect him.
The day all secrets become known.
He will have no power, nor a helper.
By the sky that returns (the water).
By the earth that cracks (to grow plants).
This is a serious narration.

value: Not to be taken lightly.
YENİSİ: Hafife almayın.

value: They plot and scheme.
YENİSİ: Onlar düzen ve plan kurarlar.

value: But so do I.
YENİSİ: Fakat Ben de öyle.

value: Just respite the disbelievers a short respite.
YENİSİ: Sadece, inkârcılara kısa bir süre mühlet tanı.

value: Glorify the name of your Lord, the Most High.
YENİSİ: Yüceler Yücesi olan Rabbinin adını yücelt.

value: He creates and shapes.
He designs and guides.
He produces the pasture.
Then turns it into light hay.
We will recite to you; do not forget.
Everything is in accordance with GOD’s will; He knows what is declared, and what is hidden.
YENİSİ: Her şey TANRI’nın iradesine göredir; O, neyin beyan edildiğini ve neyin gizlendiğini bilir.

value: We will direct you to the easiest path.
Therefore, you shall remind; perhaps the reminder will benefit.
YENİSİ: Bu nedenle sen hatırlat; belki de hatırlatma fayda sağlayacaktır.

value: The reverent will take heed.
The wicked will avoid it.
Consequently, he will suffer the great Hellfire.
Wherein he never dies, nor stays alive.
Successful indeed is the one who redeems his soul.
YENİSİ: Gerçekten de nefsini kurtaran başarılı olmuştur.

value: By remembering the name of his Lord and observing the contact prayers (Salat).
Indeed, you are preoccupied with this first life.
YENİSİ: Doğrusu siz, zihni bu ilk hayatla meşgul olanlarsınız.

value: Even though the Hereafter is far better and everlasting.
YENİSİ: Ahiret çok daha iyi ve daimi olduğu hâlde.

value: This is recorded in the earlier teachings.
The teachings of Abraham and Moses.

value: Faces on that day will be shamed.
Laboring and exhausted.
Suffering in a blazing Hellfire.
Drinking from a flaming spring.
They will have no food except the useless variety.
It never nourishes, nor satisfies hunger.
Other faces on that day will be full of joy.
Satisfied with their work.
In an exalted Paradise.

value: In it, no nonsense is heard.
In it, a spring flows.
In it, there are luxurious furnishings.
And drinks made available.
And pitchers in rows.
And carpets throughout.
Why do they not reflect on the camels and how they are created?
YENİSİ: Neden develerin ve onların nasıl yaratıldıklarının üzerine derinlemesine düşünmüyorlar?

value: And the sky and how it is raised.
And the mountains and how they are constructed.
And the earth and how it is built.
You shall remind, for your mission is to deliver this reminder.
YENİSİ: Sen hatırlat, çünkü senin görevin bu hatırlatıcıyı iletmektir.

value: You have no power over them.
YENİSİ: Senin onlar üzerinde hiçbir gücün yoktur.

value: As for those who turn away and disbelieve.
GOD will commit them to the great retribution.
YENİSİ: TANRI onları büyük azaba bırakacaktır.

value: To us is their ultimate destiny.
Then we will call them to account.
By the dawn.
And the ten nights.*
By the even and the odd.*
By the night as it passes.
A profound oath, for one who possesses intelligence.
Have you noted what your Lord did to ‘Aad?
Erum; the town with tall buildings.
There was nothing like it anywhere.
Also Thamoud, who carved the rocks in their valley.
And Pharaoh who possessed might.
They all transgressed in the land.
They spread evil throughout.
Consequently, your Lord poured upon them a whipping retribution.
Your Lord is ever watchful.
When the human being is tested by his Lord, through blessings and joy, he says, “My Lord is generous towards me.”
But if He tests him through reduction in provisions, he says, “My Lord is humiliating me!”
Wrong! It is you who brought it on yourselves by not regarding the orphan.
And not advocating charity towards the poor.
YENİSİ: Ve yoksula yönelik hayır işini savunmayarak.

value: And consuming the inheritance of helpless orphans.
And loving the money too much.
Indeed, when the earth is crushed, utterly crushed.

value: And your Lord comes, together with the angels in row after row.
On that day, Gehenna will be brought forth. On that day, the human being will remember—but what a remembrance—it will be too late.
He will say, “Oh, I wish I prepared for my (eternal) life.”
On that day, no retribution could be worse than His retribution.
And no confinement is as effective as His confinement.
As for you, O content soul.

value: Return to your Lord, pleased and pleasing.
YENİSİ: Rabbine geri dön, hoşnut ve hoşnut eden olarak.

Welcome into My Paradise.
I solemnly swear by this town.

value: The town where you live.
YENİSİ: Yaşadığın beldeye.

value: The begetting and the begotten.
YENİSİ: Bir evlada baba olana ve bir babaya evlat olana.

YENİSİ: Biz insanoğlunu, (kendini kurtarması için) sıkı çalışsın diye yarattık.*

value: Does he think that no one will ever call him to account?
YENİSİ: Ondan hiç kimsenin hesap sormayacağını mı sanıyor?

value: He boasts, “I spent so much money!”
YENİSİ: Böbürleniyor, “Ben onca para harcadım!”

value: Does he think that no one sees him?
YENİSİ: Kendisini kimsenin görmediğini mi sanıyor?

value: Did we not give him two eyes?
YENİSİ: Ona iki göz vermedik mi?

value: A tongue and two lips?
YENİSİ: Bir dil ve iki de dudak?

value: Did we not show him the two paths?
YENİSİ: Biz, ona iki yolu göstermedik mi?

value: He should choose the difficult path.
YENİSİ: O, zor olan yolu seçmeli.

value: Which one is the difficult path?
YENİSİ: Hangisi zor olan yoldur?

value: The freeing of slaves.
YENİSİ: Köleleri azat etmek.

value: Feeding, during the time of hardship.
YENİSİ: Yokluk zamanında doyurmak.

value: Orphans who are related.
YENİSİ: Akraba olan yetimleri.

value: Or the poor who is in need.
YENİSİ: Yahut ihtiyaç halindeki yoksulu.

value: And being one of those who believe, and exhorting one another to be steadfast, and exhorting one another to be kind.
YENİSİ: Ve inananlardan biri olmak, birbirlerini kararlı olmaya teşvik etmek ve birbirlerini merhametli olmaya teşvik etmektir.

YENİSİ: Bunlar mutluluğu hak etmişlerdir.

YENİSİ: Vahiylerimizi inkâr etmiş olanlara gelince, onlarsa sefaleti üzerlerine çekmişlerdir.

value: They will be confined in the Hellfire.
YENİSİ: Onlar Cehennem Ateşinde hapsedilecekler.

value: Say, “I seek refuge in the Lord of the people.

value: “The King of the people.

value: “The god of the people.

value: “From the evils of sneaky whisperers.
YENİSİ: “Sinsi fısıldayıcıların kötülüklerinden.

value: “Who whisper into the chests of the people.

value: “Be they of the jinns, or the people.”

value: *Thus, the total occurrence of the crucial word “God” (Allah) throughout the Quran is 2698,19x142. The reader can ascertain the accuracy of this total by randomly checking the numbers of the word “God” at the bottom of any page in this book. Additionally, if one adds the verse numbers wherever the word “God” occurs, the total comes to 118123, also a multiple of 19 (118123 = 19x6217). Details of the Quran’s unique mathematical composition are given in Appendices 1, 2, 24, 25, 26, and 29.
YENİSİ: *Böylece, tüm Kuran boyunca çok önemli olan “Tanrı” (Allah) kelimesinin toplam geçişi 2698, 19 x 142’dir. Okuyucu, bu kitabın herhangi bir sayfasının altındaki “Tanrı” kelimesinin sayılarını rastgele kontrol ederek bu toplamın doğruluğunu saptayabilir. Buna ek olarak, eğer biri “Tanrı” kelimesinin geçtiği ayetlerin numaralarını toplarsa, toplam 118123 eder, bu da 19’un katıdır (118123 = 19 x 6217). Kuran’ın benzersiz matematiksel yapısının ayrıntıları Ek 1, 2, 24, 25, 26 & 29’da verilmiştir.
